Umineko Project (UP): A couple casual chats broke out here and there, but they seemed somehow distant; it was a quiet dinner, granting no respite from the intrusive sound of rain that was creeping into the dining hall.
Steam (ST): A couple casual chats broke out here and there, but they seemed somehow distant, and the meal ended up being so quiet that you couldn't ignore the sound of the rain sneaking into the dining hall.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): A couple casual chats broke out here and there, but they seemed somehow distant. In this silence, the sound of the rain snuck into the dining hall.
PC Japanese (JP): ささやかな談笑が時折聞かれたが、それらはどこかよそよそしく、雨の音が食堂に忍び込んでくることを忘れさせない静かな晩餐だった。
Russian (RU): Там и сям зародилось несколько непринуждённых бесед, но они казались какими‐то далёкими. В этой тишине в обеденный зал закрался звук дождя.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Houve uma conversa casual aqui e ali, mas eles pareciam distantes de alguma forma; foi um jantar quieto, sem conceder nenhuma pausa ao som da chuva que parecia escorrer pela sala de jantar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然時而能聽到稀疏的談笑聲，不過總覺得這些談笑中帶著份冷淡。這是一場安靜的晚餐，靜到讓人無法忘懷那悄悄溜進餐廳的雨聲。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然时而能听到稀疏的谈笑声，不过总觉得这些谈笑中带着份冷淡。这是一场安静的晚餐，静到让人无法忘怀那悄悄溜进餐厅的雨声。
Indonesian (IDN): Beberapa obrolan ringan muncul di sana-sini, tapi semuanya terasa agak jauh, dan makan malam itu begitu hening sampai suara hujan yang merembes ke ruang makan pun terdengar jelas.
Italian (IT): Spuntarono un paio di chiacchierate qua e là, ma sembravano in qualche modo lontane. La cena finì con l'essere così tranquilla, da rendere impossibile ignorare il rumore della pioggia, il quale aleggiava nella sala da pranzo.
Turkish (TR): Arada birkaç sıradan sohbet döndü ama nedense mesafeliydiler; sessiz bir akşam yemeğiydi ve yemek salonuna sızan yağmurun rahatsız edici sesi aralıksız devam etti.

Umineko Project (UP): Just as humans rule when the sun is up, the time when the sun is down is ruled by those that are not human.

Russian (RU): Люди правят, когда на небесах царит солнце, но стоит только солнцу зайти, и в права вступают создания, не являющиеся людьми.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os humanos governam quando o Sol está alto, mas no momento em que ele se põe, passa a ser governado por aqueles que não são humanos.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 若说阳光普照的时段是人类统治的时段的话，那黑云蔽日的时段即是非人者统治的时段。

Umineko Project (UP): The darkness of night that now surrounded Rokkenjima was ruled not by the Ushiromiya family, but by another master.

Original Witch Hunt (OG): The darkness of night that now surrounded Rokkenjima was ruled, not by the Ushiromiya family, but by another master.

Turkish (TR): Şimdi Rokkenjima'yı saran gece karanlığı Ushiromiya ailesi tarafından değil, başka bir efendi tarafından yönetiliyordu.

Umineko Project (UP): Did this master take pity on Maria when she was alone and pummeled by the rain in the rose garden, and lend her an umbrella...?
Steam (ST): Did this Master take pity on Maria when she was alone and being pummeled by the rain in the rose garden, lending her an umbrella...?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Did this Master take pity on Maria when she was alone and pummeled by the rain in the rose garden, and lend her an umbrella...?
PC Japanese (JP): その支配者は、薔薇庭園でひとり雨に打たれていた真里亞を不憫に思い、傘を貸したのだろうか…。
Russian (RU): Пожалел ли Кинзо Марию, дав ей, стоящей в одиночестве в розарии и обливаемой дождём, зонтик?..
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Teria este mestre pena da Maria quando a viu sozinha pegando chuva no jardim de rosas, e então lhe emprestado um guarda‐chuva...?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 是這位支配者，因可怜一個人在玫瑰庭園裡蒙受風吹雨打的真里亞，而借予了傘嗎…？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 是这位支配者，因可怜一个人在玫瑰庭园里蒙受风吹雨打的真里亚，而借予了伞吗…？

Italian (IT): Che questo padrone avesse avuto pietà per Maria, mentre era sola nel roseto sotto la pioggia incessante, e le avesse prestato un ombrello...?
Turkish (TR): Bu efendi, Maria gül bahçesinde yalnızken ve yağmur altında ezilirken ona acıdı ve bir şemsiye ödünç verdi mi...?

PC Japanese (JP): 嘉音は窓の向こうにぼんやり見える薔薇庭園の外灯を見る。それはぼんやりと光るだけで、周りを照らすには至っていない。

Umineko Project (UP): Perhaps the weather was also a factor.{n}You often hear stories about how things like atmospheric pressure can influence people's moods and physical health.

Original Witch Hunt (OG): Can the weather change how people act? You often hear stories about how things like atmospheric pressure can influence people's moods and physical health.
PC Japanese (JP): 天気のせいもあるのだろうか。気圧などは人間の体調や機嫌にも影響を与えると聞いたことがある。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 天気のせいもあるのだろうか。{n}気圧などは人間の体調や機嫌にも影響を与えると聞いたことがある。

Chinese Simplified (CN): 大概也有天气的原因吧。{n}曾听过某种传闻，说气压之类的东西也能影响人类的身体状况和情绪。
Indonesian (IDN): Bisakah cuaca mengubah cara orang bertindak? Kau sering mendengar cerita tentang bagaimana tekanan udara bisa memengaruhi suasana hati dan kesehatan fisik seseorang.
Italian (IT): Che l'umore generale sia stato influenzato anche dal maltempo? Spesso si sentono storie su come la pressione atmosferica e simili possano influenzare la salute e il temperamento delle persone.
Turkish (TR): Belki de hava durumu da bir etkendi.{n}Atmosfer basıncı gibi şeylerin insanların ruh hallerini ve fiziksel sağlıklarını nasıl etkileyebildiğine dair hikayeleri sık sık duyarsınız.

Umineko Project (UP): For some time now, everyone had been making periodic attempts to clear the gloomy atmosphere, but any conversation was quickly cut off, and in the end the dining hall was simply buried by the sound of the rain.
Steam (ST): For some time now, everyone had been struggling to clear the gloomy atmosphere, but any conversation was quickly cut off, and in the end, the dining hall was simply filled by the sound of the rain.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): For some time now, everyone had been struggling to clear the gloomy atmosphere, but any conversation was quickly cut off, and in the end the dining hall was simply buried by the sound of the rain.
PC Japanese (JP): 先ほどから、この陰鬱な空気を晴らそうと度々みんなが挑戦するのだが、どんな話題も一時的なものにしかならず、結局は雨の音で食堂を埋めるほかなかった。
Russian (RU): Какое‐то время все пытались развеять мрачную атмосферу, но любой зарождающийся разговор быстро затухал и, в конце концов, обеденный зал заполнил звук дождя.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Durante algum tempo, todos fizeram tentativas periódicas de tentar limpar o clima que havia sido construído, mas qualquer conversa era rapidamente interrompida, e no fim, a sala de jantar foi simplesmente tomada pelo som da chuva.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖說從剛才開始，大家都在不斷嘗試掃去這郁悶的氣氛，但不管什麼話題都只是聊一會就斷，結果只能任由雨聲將餐廳淹沒。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽说从刚才开始，大家都在不断尝试扫去这郁闷的气氛，但不管什么话题都只是聊一会就断，结果只能任由雨声将餐厅淹没。
Indonesian (IDN): Sudah sejak beberapa waktu lalu, semua orang berusaha mengusir suasana suram, tapi setiap percakapan cepat terputus, dan pada akhirnya, ruang makan hanya dipenuhi suara hujan.
Italian (IT): Era da un po' che tutti stavano cercando per più volte di alleggerire quell'atmosfera cupa, ma ogni conversazione veniva subito smorzata, e alla fine la sala da pranzo venne sommersa dal suono della pioggia.
Turkish (TR): Bir süredir herkes kasvetli havayı dağıtmak için periyodik girişimlerde bulunuyordu, ancak her türlü konuşma çabucak kesildi ve sonunda yemek salonu yağmurun sesine gömüldü.

Umineko Project (UP): Dessert was some kind of chocolate cake accompanied by pear sherbet.
Steam (ST): Dessert was some kind of chocolate cake accompanied by pear sherbet.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Dessert was some kind of chocolate cake accompanied by pear sherbet.
PC Japanese (JP): デザートは何とかショコラケーキに梨のシャーベットを添えた物。
Russian (RU): Десертом оказался какой‐то шоколадный торт, к которому также подавали грушевый шербет.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A sobremesa era um tipo de bolo de chocolate acompanhado por um sorvete de pêssego.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 甜點是某種巧克力蛋糕配梨汁冰激凌。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 甜点是某种巧克力蛋糕配梨汁冰激凌。
Indonesian (IDN): Hidangan penutup adalah semacam kue cokelat ditemani sorbet pir.
Italian (IT): Il dessert era una sorta di torta al cioccolato, accompagnata da un sorbetto alla pera.
Turkish (TR): Tatlı olarak armut şerbeti eşliğinde bir çeşit çikolatalı kek vardı.

Umineko Project (UP): Gohda‐san enthusiastically explained the recipe as if delivering the coup de grace, but I quickly forgot the details.
Steam (ST): Gohda-san enthusiastically explained the recipe as soon as this final dish was presented, but I quickly forgot the details.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Gohda-san enthusiastically explained the recipe as soon as this final dish was presented, but I quickly forgot the details.
PC Japanese (JP): 郷田さんが、トドメとばかりにレシピについて熱弁を奮ってくれたが、細かい部分は記憶に残らなかった。
Russian (RU): Когда это завершающее трапезу блюдо было представлено нам, Года с энтузиазмом пустился в описание его рецепта, но подробности быстро вылетели у меня из головы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O Gohda‐san, entusiasmado, explicou sobre a receita como se estivesse entregando o golpe de misericórdia, mas eu esqueci rapidamente dos detalhes.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然鄉田熱情主動地拚命向我們介紹了做法中的絕妙之處，但具體的細節都沒能留在記憶裡。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然乡田热情主动地拼命向我们介绍了做法中的绝妙之处，但具体的细节都没能留在记忆里。
Indonesian (IDN): Gohda-san dengan penuh semangat menjelaskan resepnya segera setelah hidangan penutup disajikan, tapi aku langsung lupa semua detailnya.
Italian (IT): Come tocco finale, Gouda-san tenne un discorso appassionato in merito alla ricetta, ma i dettagli minori non mi rimasero in mente.
Turkish (TR): Gohda-san sanki lütufta bulunuyormuş gibi heyecanla tarifini açıkladı ama ayrıntıları çabucak unuttum.

Umineko Project (UP): The guest of honor, Grandfather, was absent; the weather was horrible; and the person who had lent Maria the umbrella was still a mystery.
Steam (ST): The guest of honor, Grandfather, was absent, the weather was horrible, and the identity of the one who'd lent Maria an umbrella remained a mystery.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The guest of honor, Grandfather, was absent, the weather was horrible, and the person who had lent Maria the umbrella was still a mystery.
PC Japanese (JP): 主賓である祖父さまを欠き、天気も最悪で、真里亞に傘を貸した人物も謎のまま。
Russian (RU): Почётный гость, коим был дед, отсутствовал, погода была ужасная, а человек, давший Марии зонтик, так и остался загадкой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O convidado de honra — o vovô — estava ausente; o tempo estava horrível, e a pessoa que emprestou o guarda‐chuva para a Maria ainda era desconhecida.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 主賓爺爺缺席，天氣又壞得不得了，借給真里亞傘的人也還是一個謎。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 主宾爷爷缺席，天气又坏得不得了，借给真里亚伞的人也还是一个谜。
Indonesian (IDN): Tamu kehormatan, yaitu kakek, tidak hadir, cuaca buruk, dan siapa yang meminjamkan payung pada Maria masih jadi misteri.
Italian (IT): Il nonno, l'ospite più atteso, era assente, il tempo era orribile, e la persona che aveva prestato l'ombrello a Maria restava avvolta nel mistero.
Turkish (TR): Onur konuğu Büyükbaba kayıptı; hava korkunçtu ve Maria'ya şemsiyeyi ödünç veren kişi hâlâ bir muammaydı.

Umineko Project (UP): When dinner ended, no one felt even one bit refreshed.
Steam (ST): When dinner ended, no one felt even one bit refreshed.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When dinner ended, no one felt even one bit refreshed.
PC Japanese (JP): 何ともすっきりしない気分のまま、晩餐は終わりを迎えてしまった。
Russian (RU): По окончании трапезы никто не чувствовал себя отдохнувшим и расслабившимся.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando o jantar chegou ao fim, ninguém se sentiu minimamente revigorado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 晚餐在極不舒暢的氣氛下，迎來了尾聲。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 晚餐在极不舒畅的气氛下，迎来了尾声。
Indonesian (IDN): Saat makan malam selesai, tak satu pun dari kami merasa sedikit pun lebih lega.
Italian (IT): Quando la cena si concluse, il clima rimase molto teso...
Turkish (TR): Yemek sona erdiğinde, kimse kendini biraz bile yenilenmiş hissetmiyordu.

Umineko Project (UP): ...It was too late now, but I realized painfully that taste wasn't the only important part of a meal. The whole atmosphere was also critical.
Steam (ST): ...It was too late now, but I realized painfully that taste wasn't the only important part of a meal. The whole atmosphere was also critical.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...It was too late now, but we realized painfully that taste wasn't the only important part of a meal. The whole atmosphere was also critical.
PC Japanese (JP): …今さらだが、食事ってのは味だけでなく、全体の雰囲気も大事なのだなと痛感する。
Russian (RU): ...С большим опозданием, но мы поняли, что в трапезе важную роль играет не только вкус подаваемых блюд, но и атмосфера.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...É um pouco tarde agora, mas eu percebi de forma dolorosa que o sabor não era a única coisa importante de uma refeição. Toda a atmosfera em volta dela também.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …雖說這麼說有點馬後炮，但此事真是讓我深切感到所謂用餐不只是味道，整體的氛圍也很重要。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …虽说这么说有点马后炮，但此事真是让我深切感到所谓用餐不只是味道，整体的氛围也很重要。
Indonesian (IDN): ...Meski sudah terlambat, aku sadar betul bahwa rasa bukan satu-satunya hal penting dalam sebuah santapan. Suasana keseluruhan juga sangat penting.
Italian (IT): Quando ormai era troppo tardi, compresi pienamente che in un pasto non conta solo il sapore dei cibi, ma anche l'atmosfera presente mentre si mangia.
Turkish (TR): ...Artık çok geçti ama yemeğin tek önemli kısmının lezzet olmadığını acı bir şekilde fark ettim. Tüm atmosfer de çok önemliydi.

Umineko Project (UP): Gohda‐san, the supposed conductor of this performance called dinner, did his best to enliven the place, dropping little jokes left and right, but it seemed they didn't quite get there.
Steam (ST): Gohda-san, the supposed conductor of this musical piece called dinner, did his best to enliven the place, dropping little jokes left and right, but apparently not one of them succeeded.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Gohda-san, the supposed conductor of this musical piece called dinner, did his best to enliven the place, dropping little jokes left and right, but apparently not one of them succeeded.
PC Japanese (JP): 晩餐という名の演奏の指揮者でもある郷田さんは、場を盛り上げようと、色々と小洒落たスピーチなどで頑張ってくれたが、ひとつ及ばなかったようだ。
Russian (RU): Года‐сан, которому полагалось быть дирижёром музыкального произведения под названием ужин, изо всех сил старался внести оживление, отпуская миленькие шутки направо и налево, но, похоже, ни одна из них не добилась успеха.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O Gohda‐san, o suposto condutor desta atuação chamada jantar, fez de tudo para tentar animar o lugar contando uma piada aqui e ali, mas parece que ele não conseguiu.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 鄉田指揮著這場名為晚餐的演奏會。而他身為指揮者，為了搞熱氣氛，致詞呀講小笑話呀做了不少努力，不過這似乎全都成了白費力氣。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 乡田指挥着这场名为晚餐的演奏会。而他身为指挥者，为了搞热气氛，致词呀讲小笑话呀做了不少努力，不过这似乎全都成了白费力气。
Indonesian (IDN): Gohda-san, sang konduktor dari simfoni bernama makan malam ini, sudah berusaha semaksimal mungkin menghidupkan suasana, melemparkan lelucon kecil ke sana-sini, tapi tampaknya tak satu pun yang berhasil.
Italian (IT): Gouda-san, che doveva essere il direttore d'orchestra di questa cena, fece del suo meglio per ravvivare gli animi con diverse battutine, ma sembrava che nessuna di esse sortisse effetto.
Turkish (TR): Gohda-san, akşam yemeği adı verilen bu gösterinin sözde orkestra şefi, sağa sola küçük şakalar yaparak mekânı canlandırmak için elinden geleni yaptı, ancak görünüşe göre tam olarak başaramadı.

Umineko Project (UP): After taking orders for after‐dinner coffee, tea, and orange juice, he left for the kitchen.
Steam (ST): After taking orders for after-dinner coffee, tea, and orange juice, he left for the kitchen.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): After taking orders for after-dinner coffee, tea, and orange juice, he left for the kitchen.
PC Japanese (JP): 食後はコーヒー、紅茶、オレンジジュースのどれがいいかと全員の注文を聞くと、厨房に下がっていった。
Russian (RU): Выслушав распоряжение о подаче послеобеденного кофе, чая и апельсинового сока, он направился на кухню.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Após o jantar, ele recebeu pedidos de café, chá e suco de laranja, e se dirigiu à cozinha.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他一一問過大家飯後飲料是要咖啡、紅茶，還是橙汁後，去了廚房。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他一一问过大家饭后饮料是要咖啡、红茶，还是橙汁后，去了厨房。
Indonesian (IDN): Setelah mencatat pesanan kopi, teh, dan jus jeruk untuk setelah makan, dia pergi ke dapur.
Italian (IT): Nel dopocena chiese a tutti se volessero ordinare del caffè, del tè nero o del succo d'arancia, per poi tornarsene in cucina.
Turkish (TR): Yemek sonrası kahve, çay ve portakal suyu siparişlerini aldıktan sonra mutfağa gitti.

Umineko Project (UP): As soon as he disappeared, Uncle Krauss spoke.
Steam (ST): As soon as he disappeared, Uncle Krauss spoke.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As soon as he disappeared, Krauss oji-san spoke.
PC Japanese (JP): その姿が見えなくなってから、蔵臼伯父さんが言う。
Russian (RU): Как только он удалился, дядя Краусс заговорил.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Assim que ele saiu de cena, o tio Krauss falou.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 等看不到他的人影時，藏臼伯父張開了口。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 等看不到他的人影时，藏臼伯父张开了口。
Indonesian (IDN): Begitu dia menghilang, Paman Krauss angkat bicara.
Italian (IT): Dopo che Gouda se ne andò, zio Klaus prese la parola.
Turkish (TR): O gözden kaybolur kaybolmaz, Krauss Amca konuştu.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Umineko Project (UP): "......My, my. How truly irksome that this dinner, which Gohda worked so hard to create, has been so poorly received."
Steam (ST): "......My, my. What a waste that the dinner Gohda worked so hard to create has met with such a gloomy atmosphere."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「……やれやれ。せっかく郷田が腕を揮ってくれた晩餐も、こうも沈み込んでしまっては実に味気ないというものだ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……やれやれ。せっかく郷田が腕を揮ってくれた晩餐も、こうも沈み込んでしまっては実に味気ないというものだ」
Russian (RU): "......Ай‐яй‐яй. Право, какая жалость. Года так старался приготовить этот ужин, а он был так вяло встречен."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Francamente. Quão irritante está este jantar, que o Gohda trabalhou tanto para preparar, sendo tão mal recebido."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……哎呀哎呀。好不容易等到的鄉田揮刀主廚的晚餐，居然變得這麼沉悶，實在是沒意思啊。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……哎呀哎呀。好不容易等到的乡田挥刀主厨的晚餐，居然变得这么沉闷，实在是没意思啊。」
Indonesian (IDN): "......Wah, wah. Sayang sekali makan malam yang disiapkan dengan susah payah oleh Gohda diwarnai suasana sesuram ini."
Italian (IT): "...Santo cielo. È davvero un peccato che la cena per cui Gouda si è dato da fare con tanto impegno abbia incontrato così poco entusiasmo."
Turkish (TR): "......Aman aman. Gohda'nın hazırlamak için çok uğraştığı bu yemeğin bu kadar kötü karşılanması gerçekten çok üzücü."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Umineko Project (UP): ".........Yes, seriously. It feels like nothing would taste good today. It's just that kind of mood."
Steam (ST): ".........Yes, absolutely. It just feels like nothing would taste good today."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「………えぇ、まったくね。今日は何を食べても美味しく感じられない、そういう気分よ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………えぇ、まったくね。今日は何を食べても美味しく感じられない、そういう気分よ」
Russian (RU): ".........И не говори. Просто такое настроение не даёт как следует насладиться вкусом."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Sim, realmente. É como se nada pudesse ter um gosto bom em um dia como esse. É justamente este tipo de clima."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………是啊，的確如此呢。就今天這心情，吃什麼都不會覺得好吃呢。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………是啊，的确如此呢。就今天这心情，吃什么都不会觉得好吃呢。」
Indonesian (IDN): ".........Ya, benar sekali. Rasanya seperti apa pun yang kami makan hari ini tidak akan terasa enak."
Italian (IT): "...Già, davvero. Oggi è una giornata in cui tutto quello che si mangia non sembra avere sapore."
Turkish (TR): ".........Evet, gerçekten de. Bugün hiçbir şeyin tadı güzel olmayacakmış gibi geliyor. Öyle bir ruh hali işte."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Umineko Project (UP): "Hoh. I would love to hear why you feel that way. Sometime later, allow me, as your older brother, to help cheer you up."
Steam (ST): "Hoh. I'd like to know why you feel that way. Later on, I'll do all I can as your older brother to help cheer you up."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Ho. I want to know why you feel that way. Sometime later, allow me, as your older brother, to help cheer you up."
PC Japanese (JP): 「ほぅ。どうしてそういう気分なのか聞きたいね。心が晴れ晴れできるよう、兄として後で協力させてもらうよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「ほぅ。どうしてそういう気分なのか聞きたいね。心が晴れ晴れできるよう、兄として後で協力させてもらうよ」
Russian (RU): "Хо. Я хотел бы знать, почему ты так себя чувствуешь. Когда‐нибудь попозже, позволь мне, как старшему брату, подбодрить тебя."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Hoh. Eu adoraria ouvir o porquê de você se sentir dessa forma. Mais tarde, me permita, como seu irmão mais velho, ajudá‐la a se animar."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「喔？這倒是想問問你為什麼會是這種心情呢。等下讓當哥的幫你把心情變得愉快輕鬆點。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「喔？这倒是想问问你为什么会是这种心情呢。等下让当哥的帮你把心情变得愉快轻松点。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Hoh. Aku ingin tahu kenapa kau merasa seperti itu. Nanti, sebagai kakakmu, aku akan melakukan segala yang aku bisa untuk menghiburmu."
Italian (IT): "Oh. Mi piacerebbe sapere come mai ti senti così. Permettimi più tardi di aiutarti a tirarti su, in qualità di tuo fratello maggiore."
Turkish (TR): "Hoh. Neden böyle hissettiğini duymak isterim. Daha sonra, ağabeyin olarak seni neşelendirmeme izin ver."

Umineko Project (UP): Auntie Eva grimaced slightly.{n}...I had already heard that she was not on good terms with Uncle Krauss, but now I could clearly feel it.
Steam (ST): Aunt Eva grimaced slightly. ...I'd already heard she wasn't on good terms with Uncle Krauss, but it was pretty clear now.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Eva oba-san grimaced slightly....I had already heard that she was not on good terms with Krauss oji-san, but now I could clearly feel it.
PC Japanese (JP): 絵羽伯母さんは表情をちょっぴりだけ歪ませる。…蔵臼伯父さんと仲が悪いことはすでに聞いていたが、それをはっきりと感じさせるものだった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 絵羽伯母さんは表情をちょっぴりだけ歪ませる。{n}…蔵臼伯父さんと仲が悪いことはすでに聞いていたが、それをはっきりと感じさせるものだった。
Russian (RU): Тётя Ева чуть поморщилась.{n}...Я слышал, что она была слегка на ножах с дядей Крауссом, но теперь я ясно это ощутил.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A tia Eva fez uma leve careta.{n}...Eu já sabia que ela não se dava bem com o tio Krauss, mas agora eu consigo perceber isso claramente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 繪羽姑母的表情稍稍變得有點扭曲。{n}…以前聽說過她和藏臼伯父關係不好，但這情形讓我明確感覺到了這傳聞所言非虛。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 绘羽姑母的表情稍稍变得有点扭曲。{n}…以前听说过她和藏臼伯父关系不好，但这情形让我明确感觉到了这传闻所言非虚。
Indonesian (IDN): Bibi Eva sedikit merengut. ...Aku sudah pernah dengar bahwa hubungannya dan Paman Krauss tidak baik, dan kini terlihat jelas.
Italian (IT): Il volto di zia Eva si accigliò lievemente... Sapevo già che non fosse in buoni rapporti con zio Klaus, ma adesso la cosa era perfettamente chiara.
Turkish (TR): Eva Teyze hafifçe yüzünü buruşturdu.{n}...Krauss Amca ile arasının iyi olmadığını zaten duymuştum ama şimdi bunu açıkça hissedebiliyordum.

Umineko Project (UP): When I looked around, I noticed that my dad and Auntie Rosa were also grimacing.
Steam (ST): When I looked around, I noticed that my father and Aunt Rosa were also grimacing.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When I looked around, I noticed that my father and Rosa oba-san were also grimacing.
PC Japanese (JP): 見れば、表情を歪めているのは親父も、楼座叔母さんもだった。
Russian (RU): Оглядевшись, я заметил, что отец с тётей Розой тоже поморщились.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando eu olhei em volta, eu percebi que meu pai e a tia Rosa também estavam da mesma forma.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 轉頭一看，我老爸和樓座姑母的表情也扭曲了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 转头一看，我老爸和楼座姑母的表情也扭曲了。
Indonesian (IDN): Saat aku melihat sekeliling, aku menyadari bahwa ayahku dan Bibi Rosa juga merengut.
Italian (IT): Guardandomi attorno, mi accorsi che anche il mio vecchio e zia Rosa si erano rabbuiati.
Turkish (TR): Etrafıma baktığımda babamın ve Rosa Teyze'nin de yüzlerini buruşturduklarını fark ettim.

Umineko Project (UP): Anyhow, it looked like there was something besides the weather that was troubling all of them...
Steam (ST): Apparently, there was something besides the weather troubling all of them...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Anyhow, it looked like there was something besides the weather that was troubling all of them.
PC Japanese (JP): どうやら、一同の気が晴れないのは、天気以外にも理由があるらしい…。
Russian (RU): Судя по всему, было что‐то ещё помимо погоды, что беспокоило их.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): De qualquer maneira, parecia que havia mais alguma coisa entre eles além do clima, que estava os incomodando...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 看來，大家心情不好的理由，除了天氣之外還有別的…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 看来，大家心情不好的理由，除了天气之外还有别的…。
Indonesian (IDN): Tampaknya ada hal lain selain cuaca yang mengganggu mereka semua...
Italian (IT): Ad ogni modo, il turbamento di tutti i presenti non era dovuto solamente al tempo metereologico...
Turkish (TR): Bir nedenden, hepsinin canını sıkan havadan başka bir şey varmış gibi görünüyordu...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Umineko Project (UP): "......Auntie Eva and my dad, ...they both look like they're in a bad mood."
Steam (ST): "......Both Aunt Eva and my Dad... aren't looking too happy."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......Both Eva oba-san and my father,...they aren't looking too happy."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……絵羽叔母さんもウチの親父も、…ずいぶん機嫌が悪そうっすね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……絵羽伯母さんもウチの親父も、…ずいぶん機嫌が悪そうっすね」
Russian (RU): "......Тётя Ева и мой отец что‐то не выглядят шибко довольными."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......A tia Eva e o meu pai, ...ambos parecem estar de mau humor."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……繪羽姑母和我老爸，…他們看起來心情好差啊。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……绘羽姑母和我老爸，…他们看起来心情好差啊。」
Indonesian (IDN): "......Bibi Eva dan Ayah... kelihatannya nggak terlalu senang."
Italian (IT): "...Non trovi che sia zia Eva che il mio vecchio... sembrano essere di pessimo umore?"
Turkish (TR): "......Eva Teyze ve babam, ...ikisi de kötü bir ruh halindeymiş gibi görünüyor."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Umineko Project (UP): "Really? I don't think so."
Steam (ST): "Really? I don't think so."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「そう？　私はそうは思いませんよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そう？　私はそうは思いませんよ」
Russian (RU): "Неужели? Мне так не кажется."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Mesmo? Eu não penso assim."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「是嗎？我不這麼認為。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「是吗？我不这么认为。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Begitu ya? Kurasa tidak."
Italian (IT): "Davvero? A me non sembra."
Turkish (TR): "Gerçekten mi? Hiç sanmıyorum."

Umineko Project (UP): I asked Aunt Natsuhi, who was sitting on my right, ...but it looked like she was also in a bad mood.
Steam (ST): I asked Aunt Natsuhi, who was sitting on my right, ...but she seemed to be in a bad mood as well.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I asked Natsuhi oba-san, who was sitting on my right, ...but it looked like she was also in a bad mood.
PC Japanese (JP): 右隣の夏妃伯母さんにそう尋ねるが、…どうやら伯母さんも機嫌が悪いらしい。
Russian (RU): Я обратился к тёте Нацухи, сидящей справа от меня, но, по‐видимому, она тоже пребывала в дурном настроении.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu perguntei para a tia Natsuhi, que estava sentada à minha direita, ...mas parece que ela também estava de mau humor.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然我向右鄰的夏妃伯母如此打聽道，…但伯母的心情似乎也不好。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然我向右邻的夏妃伯母如此打听道，…但伯母的心情似乎也不好。
Indonesian (IDN): Aku bertanya pada Bibi Natsuhi, yang duduk di sebelah kananku, ...tapi dia juga tampaknya sedang tidak mood.
Italian (IT): Avevo posto la questione a zia Natsuhi, che era seduta alla mia destra... ma pareva che anche lei fosse di cattivo umore.
Turkish (TR): Sağımda oturan Natsuhi Teyze'ye sordum, ...ama onun da keyfi yok gibiydi.

Umineko Project (UP): She snapped back as though she was absolutely not interested.
Steam (ST): She snapped back as if to say she was absolutely not interested.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She snapped back as though she was absolutely not interested.
PC Japanese (JP): 興味もないという風な感じで、ぴしゃりと言い切られてしまった。
Russian (RU): Её быстрый и в чём‐то резкий ответ словно призван был указать, что ей не интересна сия тема.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela respondeu como se não estivesse nem um pouco interessada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 像是沒興趣似的以嚴厲的語調把話說死了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 像是没兴趣似的以严厉的语调把话说死了。
Indonesian (IDN): Dia membalas cepat seolah ingin bilang bahwa dia sama sekali tidak tertarik.
Italian (IT): Chiuse bruscamente il discorso, come se la cosa non la riguardasse affatto.
Turkish (TR): Sanki hiç ilgilenmiyormuş gibi tersledi.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Hideyoshi
Umineko Project (UP): "Well, our adult conversation got a little complicated. It's not somethin' kids like you need to worry about, Battler‐kun. Hahahahaha, right? Natsuhi‐san? Kyrie‐san?"
Steam (ST): "Well, our adult conversation got a little complicated. It isn't somethin' kids like you need to worry about, Battler-kun. Hahahahaha, isn't that right, Natsuhi-san, Kyrie-san?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Well, our adult conversation got a little complicated. It's not somethin' that kids like you need to worry about, Battler-kun. Hahahahaha, right? Natsuhi-san? Kyrie-san?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「まぁ、ちょいと大人の話で込み入ってなぁ。戦人くんたち子供は気にせんでええ話や！　ははははは、なぁ、夏妃さん、霧江さん。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「まぁ、ちょいと大人の話で込み入ってなぁ。戦人くんたち子供は気にせんでええ話や！　ははははは、なぁ、夏妃さん、霧江さん」
Russian (RU): "Ну, наш взрослый разговор слегка усложнился. Но вам, детям, не стоит забивать себе этим голову, Баттлер‐кун. Ха‐ха‐ха‐ха. Верно? Нацухи‐сан? Кирие‐сан?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Bem, nossas conversas de adulto podem ser um pouco complicadas. Não é algo para crianças como você se preocuparem, Battler‐kun. Hahahahaha, certo? Natsuhi‐san? Kyrie‐san?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「只是因為大人們商量的事稍稍有點難辦了而已吶。是戰人君你們小孩子不用在意的事吶！哈哈哈哈哈，對吧，夏妃姐、霧江妹？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「只是因为大人们商量的事稍稍有点难办了而已呐。是战人君你们小孩子不用在意的事呐！哈哈哈哈哈，对吧，夏妃姐、雾江妹？」
Indonesian (IDN): "Yah, pembicaraan orang dewasa tadi agak rumit. Itu bukan sesuatu yang perlu dipikirkan anak-anak sepertimu, Battler-kun. Hahahahaha, bukankah begitu, Natsuhi-san, Kyrie-san?"
Italian (IT): "Beh, abbiamo avuto dei discorsi un po' complicati fra adulti. Non è qualcosa di cui tu e gli altri ragazzi dovete preoccuparvi, Battler-kun. Ahahahah. Giusto, Natsuhi-san? Kirie-san?"
Turkish (TR): "Yetişkinlerin sohbeti biraz karmaşık bir hal aldı. Battler-kun, bu senin gibi çocukların endişelenmesi gereken bir şey değil. Hahahahaha, öyle değil mi? Natsuhi-san? Kyrie-san?"

Umineko Project (UP): Uncle Hideyoshi laughed as he spoke, but without his usual brightness, so I could vaguely imagine just how complicated their adult conversation had actually become.
Steam (ST): Uncle Hideyoshi laughed as he spoke, but without his usual brightness, so I could vaguely imagine just how complicated their adult conversation had become.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Hideyoshi oji-san laughed as he spoke, but without his usual brightness, so I could vaguely imagine just how complicated their adult conversation had actually become.
PC Japanese (JP): 秀吉伯父さんが笑いながら言ってくれるが、いつもの伯父さんらしい朗らかさがなく、大人の話とやらがどれほど込み入ったのか、おぼろげに想像させてくれた。
Russian (RU): Дядя Хидэёши говорил, посмеиваясь, но в его смехе не было присущего ему света, поэтому я смутно, но догадывался, насколько на самом деле усложнилась их взрослая беседа.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O tio Hideyoshi riu enquanto falava, apesar de não estar com o seu brilho de sempre, por isso eu pude vagamente imaginar o quão complicada tinha se tornado a conversa dos adultos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然秀吉姑父在邊笑邊說，但是話中少了平時一貫的那份爽朗，讓我隱約猜到了大人們商量的事情變得有多棘手。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然秀吉姑父在边笑边说，但是话中少了平时一贯的那份爽朗，让我隐约猜到了大人们商量的事情变得有多棘手。
Indonesian (IDN): Paman Hideyoshi tertawa saat berbicara, tapi tanpa keceriaan biasanya, jadi aku bisa membayangkan betapa rumitnya pembicaraan orang dewasa mereka tadi.
Italian (IT): Lo zio Hideyoshi rideva mentre parlava, ma senza la sua solita allegria, dandomi una vaga idea su quanto si fosse complicata la loro conversazione tra adulti.
Turkish (TR): Hideyoshi Amca konuşurken güldü ama her zamanki neşesi yoktu, bu yüzden yetişkin sohbetlerinin aslında ne kadar karmaşık hale geldiğini hayal meyal tahmin edebiliyordum.

Umineko Project (UP): On top of that, even Aunt Natsuhi and Kyrie‐san, the people he had directed his comment to, ignored him as though they hadn't heard anything.
Steam (ST): On top of that, even Aunt Natsuhi and Kyrie-san, the people he had directed his comment to, ignored him as though they hadn't heard anything.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): On top of that, even Natsuhi oba-san and Kyrie-san, the people he had directed his comment to, ignored him as though they hadn't heard anything.
PC Japanese (JP): しかもその上、伯父さんが話を振った夏妃伯母さんも霧江さんも、まるで耳に入らなかったかのように無視をしている。
Russian (RU): Более того, даже тётя Нацухи и Кирие‐сан, к которым были обращены его слова, проигнорировали его, будто они ничего не слышали.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Além disso, tanto a tia Natsuhi quanto a Kyrie‐san, as pessoas para as quais o comentário se direcionava, ignoraram como se não tivessem ouvido nada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不僅如此，被秀吉姑父拋去話頭的夏妃伯母和霧江姐，簡直就像沒聽進耳朵似的不理不睬。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不仅如此，被秀吉姑父抛去话头的夏妃伯母和雾江姐，简直就像没听进耳朵似的不理不睬。
Indonesian (IDN): Ditambah lagi, bahkan Bibi Natsuhi dan Kyrie-san, yang dia ajak bicara langsung, sama sekali tak menanggapi seolah-olah mereka tidak mendengar apa-apa.
Italian (IT): Inoltre, sia zia Natsuhi che Kirie-san, a cui lo zio si era rivolto, lo ignorarono come se non lo avessero sentito...
Turkish (TR): Üstelik, yorumunu yönelttiği kişiler olan Natsuhi Teyze ve Kyrie-san bile hiçbir şey duymamış gibi onu görmezden geldiler.

Umineko Project (UP): ...I didn't know what kind of conversation they had been having while we kids were away, but it reminded me of how Dad had said he had stomach cramps when we had arrived at the mansion.
Steam (ST): ...I didn't know what kind of conversation they'd been having while us kids were away, but it reminded me of how Dad said he had stomach cramps when we arrived at the mansion.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...I didn't know what kind of conversation they had been having while the kids were away, but it reminded me of how Father had said he had stomach cramps when we had arrived at the mansion.
PC Japanese (JP): …子供抜きでどういう話をしているのかはわからないが、なるほど、親父が屋敷に挨拶に行く時、胃が痛い…みたいなことを言っていたことを思い出させられる。
Russian (RU): ...Не знаю, до чего они договорились в наше отсутствие, но мне вспомнилось, как отец, когда прибыл в особняк, говорил, что у него скручивает живот.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Eu não sei que tipo de conversa eles tiveram enquanto nós, crianças, estávamos fora, mas isso me lembra sobre o que o meu pai falou sobre as suas dores de estômago quando chegamos à mansão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …雖說不知道排除小孩子們的談話是商量了些什麼，不過姑父那句話讓我想起了老爸去大屋打招呼時說胃疼的情形。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …虽说不知道排除小孩子们的谈话是商量了些什么，不过姑父那句话让我想起了老爸去大屋打招呼时说胃疼的情形。
Indonesian (IDN): ...Aku tidak tahu pembicaraan seperti apa yang terjadi saat kami anak-anak tidak di sana, tapi ini mengingatkanku akan bagaimana Ayah bilang perutnya keram saat kami tiba di mansion.
Italian (IT): Non sapevo che tipo di discussione avessero tenuto mentre noi ragazzi non c'eravamo, ma... capisco, mi ricordava di quando, arrivati alla villa per presentarci, il mio vecchio aveva detto di avere mal di stomaco.
Turkish (TR): ...Biz çocuklar yokken ne tür bir konuşma yaptıklarını bilmiyordum, ama bu bana babamın malikaneye vardığımızda karnına kramplar girdiğini söylediğini hatırlattı.

Umineko Project (UP): The family conference might have been a playful reunion to us kids, but it was definitely different for the adults...
Steam (ST): The family conference might've been a playful reunion to us kids, but it was definitely different for the adults...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The family conference might have been a playful reunion to us kids, but it was definitely different for the adults...
PC Japanese (JP): 親族会議というものは、子供にとっては再会を喜び合う行事だが、大人にとっては必ずしもそういうものではない、ということだ…。
Russian (RU): Семейное собрание было весёлым воссоединением для нас, детей, но видно для взрослых оно было воссоединением совсем иного рода...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A conferência da família pode ser uma reunião divertida para nós crianças, mas ela é completamente diferente para os adultos...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 原來如此，雖然親族會議對小孩子來說是久別重逢一起歡鬧的聚會，但對大人來說就並不一定是這樣…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 原来如此，虽然亲族会议对小孩子来说是久别重逢一起欢闹的聚会，但对大人来说就并不一定是这样…。
Indonesian (IDN): Konferensi keluarga mungkin terasa seperti reuni santai bagi kami anak-anak, tapi bagi orang dewasa jelas berbeda...
Italian (IT): La riunione di famiglia per noi ragazzi era una gioiosa rimpatriata, ma per gli adulti era completamente diverso...
Turkish (TR): Aile konferansı biz çocuklar için eğlenceli bir buluşma olabilirdi ama yetişkinler için kesinlikle farklıydı...

Umineko Project (UP): After Uncle Hideyoshi was ignored by the other adults, an awkward silence fell over the room; Kyrie‐san spoke up.
Steam (ST): After Uncle Hideyoshi's comment was ignored by the other adults and an awkward silence fell over the room, Kyrie-san spoke up.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When Hideyoshi oji-san was ignored by the other adults and an awkward silence fell over the room, Kyrie-san spoke up.
PC Japanese (JP): 秀吉伯父さんが大人たちに無視され、何だか重苦しい沈黙が訪れた時、霧江さんが答えてくれた。
Russian (RU): Когда дядя Хидэёши оказался проигнорирован другими взрослыми, и в комнате повисла неловкая тишина, заговорила Кирие‐сан.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Após o tio Hideyoshi ter sido ignorado pelos outros adultos, um silêncio desconfortável caiu sobre a sala e a Kyrie‐san se manifestou.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 正當秀吉姑父被大人們無視，壓抑的沉默悄然到訪之時，霧江姐回答了他的話。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 正当秀吉姑父被大人们无视，压抑的沉默悄然到访之时，雾江姐回答了他的话。
Indonesian (IDN): Setelah komentar Paman Hideyoshi diabaikan oleh para orang dewasa lainnya dan keheningan canggung memenuhi ruangan, Kyrie-san angkat bicara.
Italian (IT): Nel momento in cui gli adulti ignorarono zio Hideyoshi, facendo piombare un silenzio abbastanza opprimente, Kirie-san replicò.
Turkish (TR): Hideyoshi Amca diğer yetişkinler tarafından görmezden gelindikten sonra odaya garip bir sessizlik çöktü; Kyrie-san konuştu.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Umineko Project (UP): "......We were talking about how the kids' careers would turn out. What will you do in the future, Battler‐kun? Just drift on to college? Wouldn't that be a little disheartening as a starting line for the long race of life?"
Steam (ST): "......We were talking about how the kids' careers would turn out. Such as what lies in your future, Battler-kun. Will you just drift on to college? Wouldn't that be a little disheartening as a starting line for the long race of life?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......We were talking about how the kids' careers would turn out. What would you do in the future? Just drift on to college? Wouldn't that be a little disheartening as a starting line for the long race of life?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「……子供たちの進路はどうなるのかしらとか、そういう話よ。戦人くんは将来はどうするの？　ぼんやりと大学進学？　そんなのじゃ長い人生レースのスタートラインとしては心細いわよ？」
Russian (RU): "......Мы разговаривали о ваших будущих карьерах, ребята. Чем вы планируете заняться в будущем? Просто поступить в колледж или университет? Вам не кажется, что это будет малость унылым началом в длинной гонке под названием жизнь?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Nós estávamos falando sobre qual carreira as crianças vão seguir no futuro. O que você vai fazer no futuro, Battler‐kun? Vai apenas ir para a faculdade? Isso não seria um pouco desanimador como uma linha de largada para a longa corrida da vida?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……是在商量小孩子們要如何選擇出路的事哦。戰人君你將來要怎麼辦？糊里糊塗地上大學？就把這當成漫長人生競賽的起點的話，可是會讓人感到不安的哦？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……是在商量小孩子们要如何选择出路的事哦。战人君你将来要怎么办？糊里糊涂地上大学？就把这当成漫长人生竞赛的起点的话，可是会让人感到不安的哦？」
Indonesian (IDN): "......Kami tadi sedang membicarakan masa depan karier anak-anak. Seperti apa yang menantimu, Battler-kun. Apa kau akan begitu saja melanjutkan ke universitas? Bukankah itu sedikit mengecewakan sebagai garis awal dalam perlombaan panjang bernama kehidupan?"
Italian (IT): "...Parlavamo su quali percorsi intraprenderete voi ragazzi. Cosa vuoi fare in futuro, Battler-kun? Passerai all'università senza pensarci su? Non è un punto di partenza molto incoraggiante per la corsa della vita che hai davanti a te, no?"
Turkish (TR): "......Çocukların kariyerlerinin nasıl olacağı hakkında konuşuyorduk. Gelecekte ne yapacaksın, Battler-kun? Sadece üniversiteye mi gideceksin? Uzun hayat yarışının başlangıç çizgisi olarak bu biraz cesaret kırıcı olmaz mı?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Umineko Project (UP): "Hey! Wait a sec... Kyrie‐san, if you start talking about something like that in the middle of a meal, it won't digest well and we'll all get constipated, ri~ght?"
Steam (ST): "Hey! Wait a sec... Kyrie-san, if you start talking about something like that in the middle of a meal, it won't digest well and we'll all end up getting constipated."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Hey! Wait a sec... Kyrie-san, if you start talking about something like that in the middle of a meal, it won't digest well and we'll all get constipated, ri~ght?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「あいたたたた…、霧江さん、メシの最中にそんな話されちまったら、消化不良で便秘になっちまうぜぇ〜？」
Russian (RU): "Эй! Секундочку... Кирие‐сан, если начать говорить о подобном во время еды, то она плохо переварится, и мы все схлопочем себе запор, не так ли?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ei! Espere um pouco... Kyrie‐san, se você começar a falar sobre algo assim no meio da refeição, ela não vai digerir bem e todos nós vamos ficar constipados, cer~to??"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「啊痛痛痛痛痛…，霧江姐，正在吃飯的時候說這種話，可是會讓人消化不良得便秘的啊～！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「啊痛痛痛痛痛…，雾江姐，正在吃饭的时候说这种话，可是会让人消化不良得便秘的啊～！」
Indonesian (IDN): "Heh! Tunggu dulu... Kyrie-san, kalau kau mulai bicara hal seperti itu di tengah-tengah makan, kami semua bakal susah mencerna dan akhirnya sembelit."
Italian (IT): "Ehi, ehi, ehi... Kirie-san, se inizi a parlare di queste cose durante un pasto, mi si chiuderà lo stomaco, sai?"
Turkish (TR): "Hey! Bekle bir saniye... Kyrie-san, yemeğin ortasında böyle bir şey hakkında konuşmaya başlarsan, yemeği iyi sindiremez ve hepimiz kabız oluruz, değil mi~?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Hideyoshi
Umineko Project (UP): "Wahahaha...! That's right, that's right! We were talking about Battler‐kun and Jessica‐chan's careers! You can't take the future too seriously! Wahahaha..."
Steam (ST): "Wahahaha...! That's right, that's right! We were talking about Battler-kun's and Jessica-chan's careers! You've gotta think seriously about the future! Wahahaha..."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Wahahaha! That's right, that's right! We were talking about Battler-kun and Jessica-chan's careers! You can't take the future too seriously! Wahahaha..."
PC Japanese (JP): 「わっはっはっは…！　そうやそうや、戦人くんや朱志香ちゃんの進路の話をしとったんや！　将来のことは真剣に考えんとあかんで！　わっはっはっは…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「わっはっはっは…！　そうやそうや、戦人くんや朱志香ちゃんの進路の話をしとったんや！　将来のことは真剣に考えんとあかんで！　わっはっはっは…」
Russian (RU): "Ва‐ха‐ха‐ха! Это точно! Тут ведь речь идёт и о карьере Баттлера‐куна и Джессики‐чан! Нельзя относиться к будущему чересчур серьёзно! Ва‐ха‐ха‐ха..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Wahahaha...! Isso mesmo, isso mesmo! Nós estamos falando sobre as carreiras do Battler‐kun e da Jessica‐chan! Você não pode levar tão a sério o futuro! Wahahaha..."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「哇哈哈哈…！是吶是吶，就是在商量戰人君和朱志香的前途的事吶！不去認真想想將來可不行吶！哇哈哈哈…」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「哇哈哈哈…！是呐是呐，就是在商量战人君和朱志香的前途的事呐！不去认真想想将来可不行呐！哇哈哈哈…」
Indonesian (IDN): "Wahahaha...! Benar juga, benar juga! Kami tadi membicarakan masa depan Battler-kun dan Jessica-chan! Kalian harus mulai serius memikirkan masa depan! Wahahaha..."
Italian (IT): "Wahahahah...! Giusto, giusto, stavamo parlando delle strade che Battler-kun e Jessica-chan prenderanno! Dovete pensare seriamente al vostro futuro!Wahahahah..."
Turkish (TR): "Wahahaha...! Bu doğru, bu doğru! Battler-kun ve Jessica-chan'ın kariyerleri hakkında konuşuyorduk! Geleceği bu kadar ciddiye alamazsın! Wahahaha..."

Umineko Project (UP): Hideyoshi heartily agreed as if they really had been talking about that, but they probably hadn't.
Steam (ST): Hideyoshi heartily agreed as if they really had been talking about that, but that was probably wrong.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Hideyoshi heartily agreed as if they really had been talking about that, but that was probably wrong.
PC Japanese (JP): 秀吉伯父さんは、さもそういう話だったという風に相槌を打つが、多分違う。
Russian (RU): Хидэёши охотно согласился с ней, словно они на самом деле говорили об этом, но, скорее всего, это было не так.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Hideyoshi concordou calorosamente como se realmente estivesse falando daquilo, mas provavelmente ele não estava.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然秀吉姑父說得好像真的就是那麼回事似的在幫腔，但事實多半並不是這樣。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然秀吉姑父说得好像真的就是那么回事似的在帮腔，但事实多半并不是这样。
Indonesian (IDN): Hideyoshi mengangguk dengan semangat seolah-olah memang itu yang sedang dibicarakan tadi, tapi sepertinya itu salah.
Italian (IT): Lo zio Hideyoshi annuì ripetutamente, come se avessero davvero discusso di questo, ma probabilmente non era così.
Turkish (TR): Hideyoshi sanki gerçekten bundan bahsediyorlarmış gibi içtenlikle onayladı ama muhtemelen bahsetmiyorlardı.

Umineko Project (UP): Kyrie‐san had obviously been trying to avoid talking about something.{n}However, if Kyrie‐san had determined that this was the best course of action for now, then she was probably right.
Steam (ST): Kyrie-san had been obviously trying to change the subject. However, if Kyrie-san had determined that this was the best course of action for now, then she was probably right.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Kyrie-san had been obviously trying to avoid talking about something. However, if Kyrie-san had determined that this was the best course of action for now, then she was probably right.
PC Japanese (JP): 霧江さんは、明らかに話をはぐらかしたのだ。でも、霧江さんがそうするのが最善だと判断したなら、多分、この場はそういうことなのだろう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 霧江さんは、明らかに話をはぐらかしたのだ。{n}でも、霧江さんがそうするのが最善だと判断したなら、多分、この場はそういうことなのだろう。
Russian (RU): Было очевидно, что Кирие‐сан пытается избежать разговора на какую‐то тему.{n}Но если уж Кирие‐сан была уверена, что на данный момент это был наилучший из возможных поступков, то весьма вероятно, она была права.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A Kyrie‐san estava obviamente tentando mudar o assunto da conversa.{n}No entanto, se a Kyrie‐san tinha determinado que esse era o melhor curso da situação no momento, então ela provavelmente devia estar certa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 很明顯，霧江姐是在岔開話題。{n}不過，要是霧江姐覺得這麼做是最好的話，那大概，在這種場合下就是該這麼做吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 很明显，雾江姐是在岔开话题。{n}不过，要是雾江姐觉得这么做是最好的话，那大概，在这种场合下就是该这么做吧。
Indonesian (IDN): Kyrie-san jelas sedang berusaha mengalihkan topik. Namun, jika Kyrie-san sudah memutuskan bahwa inilah tindakan terbaik untuk saat ini, maka mungkin dia memang benar.
Italian (IT): Era palese che Kirie-san stesse cambiando argomento. Tuttavia, se Kirie-san aveva ritenuto che questa fosse la cosa migliore da fare, probabilmente aveva ragione.
Turkish (TR): Kyrie-san belli ki bir şeylerden bahsetmekten kaçınmaya çalışıyordu.{n}Bununla birlikte, Kyrie-san şu an için en iyi hareket tarzının bu olduğuna karar verdiyse, muhtemelen haklıydı.

Umineko Project (UP): Taking this into account, I decided to cast aside my suspicions as to the cause behind Auntie Eva and Dad's bad moods...
Steam (ST): Taking this into account, I cast aside my suspicions as to the cause behind Aunt Eva and Dad's bad moods...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Taking this into account, I'll cast aside my suspicions as to the cause behind Eva oba-san and Dad's bad moods...
PC Japanese (JP): それを理解し、俺はこれ以上、絵羽伯母さんや親父の不機嫌の理由について疑問を持つのをやめる…。
Russian (RU): Приняв это во внимание, я отброшу подозрения касательно причины плохого настроения тёти Евы и отца...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Levando isto em conta, eu decidi descartar as minhas suspeitas sobre a causa do mau humor do meu pai e da tia Eva...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 理解此點後，我也不再對繪羽姑母和老爸為什麼不高興而抱有疑問…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 理解此点后，我也不再对绘羽姑母和老爸为什么不高兴而抱有疑问…。
Indonesian (IDN): Dengan mempertimbangkan itu, aku membuang jauh-jauh rasa curigaku terhadap penyebab muramnya wajah Bibi Eva dan Ayah...
Italian (IT): Avendo capito ciò, da lì in poi smisi di rimuginare su cosa avesse causato il pessimo umore di zia Eva e del mio vecchio...
Turkish (TR): Bunu göz önünde bulundurarak, Eva Teyze ve babamın kötü ruh hallerinin ardındaki nedene ilişkin şüphelerimi bir kenara bırakmaya karar verdim...

Umineko Project (UP): At long last, the serving cart returned, filled with coffee and tea.
Steam (ST): At long last, the serving cart returned, filled with coffee and tea.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): At long last, the serving cart returned, filled with coffee and tea.
PC Japanese (JP): やがてコーヒーや紅茶を積んだ配膳台車が戻ってくる。
Russian (RU): И вот, наконец, прибыла сервировочная тележка, заставленная кофе с чаем.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Enfim, o carrinho retornou, repleto de cafés e chás.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不久，擺著紅茶和咖啡的餐車被推了進來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不久，摆着红茶和咖啡的餐车被推了进来。
Indonesian (IDN): Akhirnya, troli saji kembali, dipenuhi kopi dan teh.
Italian (IT): Alla fine il portavivande ritornò, carico di caffè e di tè nero.
Turkish (TR): Nihayet servis arabası kahve ve çay dolu olarak geri döndü.

Umineko Project (UP): Kumasawa‐san and Shannon‐chan served it to everyone.{n}Gohda‐san then explained that, with this, tonight's dinner was over.
Steam (ST): Kumasawa-san and Shannon-chan served it to everyone. Gohda-san then explained that this concluded tonight's meal.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Kumasawa-san and Shannon-chan served it to everyone. Gohda-san then explained that, with this, tonight's dinner was over.
PC Japanese (JP): それを熊沢さんと紗音ちゃんが配膳した。そして、これで今夜の晩餐は終わりであることを郷田さんが説明する。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): それを熊沢さんと紗音ちゃんが配膳した。{n}そして、これで今夜の晩餐は終わりであることを郷田さんが説明する。
Russian (RU): Кумасава‐сан и Шаннон‐чан подали их всем.{n}Года‐сан объявил, что этим завершается сегодняшняя трапеза.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A Kumasawa‐san e a Shannon‐chan serviram a todos.{n}O Gohda‐san então explicou que, com isso, o jantar desta noite havia chegado ao fim.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 熊澤婆婆和紗音把餐車上的飲品放到了我們面前。{n}然後，鄉田宣告今夜的晚餐自此結束。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 熊泽婆婆和纱音把餐车上的饮品放到了我们面前。{n}然后，乡田宣告今夜的晚餐自此结束。
Indonesian (IDN): Kumasawa-san dan Shannon-chan menyajikannya pada semua orang. Gohda-san lalu menyatakan bahwa makan malam malam ini telah berakhir.
Italian (IT): Kumasawa-san e Shannon-chan li servirono a tutti. In seguito, Gouda-san spiegò che con questo, la cena di stasera era conclusa.
Turkish (TR): Kumasawa-san ve Shannon-chan herkese servis yaptı.{n}Gohda-san daha sonra bununla birlikte bu akşamki yemeğin bittiğini açıkladı.

Umineko Project (UP): If I had been able to eat in a more cheerful mood, it might have been the best dinner of my life.
Steam (ST): If only the mood had been a bit more cheery, it might've been the best dinner in my life.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If I had been able to eat in a more cheerful mood, it might have been the best dinner in my life.
PC Japanese (JP): もっと晴れ晴れとした気分で食えたなら、人生で最高のディナーだったろう。
Russian (RU): Если бы мне довелось отужинать в более весёлой атмосфере, это был бы лучший ужин в моей жизни.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se eu tivesse conseguido comer com um ambiente mais agradável, esse teria sido o melhor jantar da minha vida.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 如果以愉快輕鬆的心情來吃的話，這必定會成為人生中最棒的一場晚宴吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 如果以愉快轻松的心情来吃的话，这必定会成为人生中最棒的一场晚宴吧。
Indonesian (IDN): Kalau saja suasananya sedikit lebih ceria, mungkin ini akan jadi makan malam terbaik dalam hidupku.
Italian (IT): Se avessi mangiato in un'atmosfera più allegra, questa sarebbe potuta essere la miglior cena di tutta la mia vita.
Turkish (TR): Daha neşeli bir ruh haliyle yemek yiyebilseydim, hayatımın en güzel akşam yemeği olabilirdi.

Umineko Project (UP): It was a shame that this greatest of dinners couldn't have been had under the greatest of conditions.
Steam (ST): It was a shame this best of dinners couldn't have been had under the best conditions.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was a shame that this best dinner couldn't have been had under the best conditions.
PC Japanese (JP): 最高のディナーを、最高のコンディションで臨めなかったことだけが残念だった。
Russian (RU): Было очень жаль, что столь замечательный ужин не мог пройти в лучших условиях.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): É uma pena que o maior do jantares não pôde ter acontecido sob as melhores condições.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 唯一的遺憾，就是這最棒的晚宴，沒能以最佳的心情來迎接。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 唯一的遗憾，就是这最棒的晚宴，没能以最佳的心情来迎接。
Indonesian (IDN): Sayang sekali, makan malam terbaik ini tidak terjadi dalam kondisi terbaik.
Italian (IT): Era un peccato che la miglior cena non si fosse svolta nelle migliori condizioni.
Turkish (TR): Bu en güzel yemeğin en güzel koşullar altında yenememiş olması çok yazık oldu.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Umineko Project (UP): "Uu! George onii‐chan, is dinner over now? Over?"
Steam (ST): "Uu-! George onii-chan, is dinner over now? Over?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Uu-! George onii-chan, is dinner over now? Over?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「うー！　譲治お兄ちゃん、これでご飯は終わり？　終わり？」
Russian (RU): "У‐у! Джордж онии‐чан, ужин закончился? Закончился?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Uu! George onii‐chan, o jantar acabou agora? Acabou?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嗚——！讓治哥哥，用餐結束了嗎？結束了嗎？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「呜——！让治哥哥，用餐结束了吗？结束了吗？」
Indonesian (IDN): "Uu-! George onii-chan, makan malamnya sudah selesai ya? Selesai?"
Italian (IT): "Uuh! Cugino George, ora la cena è finita? È finita?"
Turkish (TR): "Uu! George onii-chan, yemek bitti mi? Bitti mi?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Umineko Project (UP): "Yes. We're all done now."
Steam (ST): "Yes. With this, dinner is finished."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Yes. With this, dinner is finished."
PC Japanese (JP): 「うん。これでおしまいだよ。」
Russian (RU): "Да. На этом ужин закончен."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sim. Todos nós já terminamos."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嗯。這就結束了喲。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「嗯。这就结束了哟。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Ya. Dengan ini, makan malam selesai."
Italian (IT): "Sì. Adesso è finita."
Turkish (TR): "Evet, bitti. Hepimiz bitirdik."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rosa
Umineko Project (UP): "That's not ladylike. Stay in your seat, and calmly drink up."
Steam (ST): "Don't be rude. Stay in your seat, and calmly drink up."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「はしたないわよ。お席について、落ち着いてジュースを飲みなさい。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「はしたないわよ。お席について、落ち着いてジュースを飲みなさい」
Russian (RU): "Воспитанные девушки так себя не ведут. Спокойно сиди на месте и допей его."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Não é assim que uma dama deveria se comportar. Fique sentada e beba o seu suco aos poucos."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「沒禮貌。快回座位，乖乖地喝果汁。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「没礼貌。快回座位，乖乖地喝果汁。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Jangan kasar. Tetaplah di tempat dudukmu, dan minumlah dengan tenang."
Italian (IT): "Non essere maleducata. Resta seduta al tuo posto, calmati, e bevi il tuo succo."
Turkish (TR): "Bu hiç hanımefendice değil. Yerinde kal ve sakince iç."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): [=UP]
Indonesian (IDN): [=ST]
Italian (IT): "Uuh!"
Turkish (TR): [=UP]

Umineko Project (UP): Maria looked like she was really excited about the occasionally crashing thunder.{n}Maybe she wanted to quickly finish eating and run over to the window.{n}She had been fidgeting for a while, waiting for the meal to end.
Steam (ST): Maria looked like she was really excited by the occasionally crashing thunder. Maybe she wanted to quickly finish eating and run over to the window. She had been fidgeting for a while, waiting for the meal to end.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Maria looked like she was really excited about the occasionally crashing thunder. Maybe she wanted to quickly finish eating and run over to the window. She had been fidgeting for a while, waiting for the meal to end.
PC Japanese (JP): 真里亞は、時折轟く雷鳴が面白くて仕方がないらしい。早く食事を終えて窓辺に駆けて行きたいのだろう。さっきからそわそわと食事の終わりを待っているようだった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 真里亞は、時折轟く雷鳴が面白くて仕方がないらしい。{n}早く食事を終えて窓辺に駆けて行きたいのだろう。{n}さっきからそわそわと食事の終わりを待っているようだった。
Russian (RU): Похоже, Мария была возбуждена из‐за время от времени раздающегося грома.{n}Быть может, ей хотелось поскорее закончить есть и подбежать к окну.{n}Она уже какое‐то время беспокойно ерзала в ожидании окончания трапезы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A Maria parecia estar realmente animada sobre o ocasional trovão que rugia.{n}Talvez ela quisesse terminar de comer rápido e correr para a janela.{n}Ela estava um pouco inquieta, esperando pelo fim do jantar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 真里亞好像覺得時而傳來的轟鳴的雷聲非常好玩。{n}是想早點結束用餐跑到窗邊去看吧。{n}貌似從剛才開始就在坐立不安地等著快點結束晚餐。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 真里亚好像觉得时而传来的轰鸣的雷声非常好玩。{n}是想早点结束用餐跑到窗边去看吧。{n}貌似从刚才开始就在坐立不安地等着快点结束晚餐。
Indonesian (IDN): Maria terlihat benar-benar bersemangat oleh suara petir yang sesekali menggelegar. Mungkin dia ingin cepat-cepat menyelesaikan makan dan berlari ke jendela. Dia sudah gelisah sejak tadi, menunggu makan malam berakhir.
Italian (IT): Sembrava che Maria era irrimediabilmente attirata dai tuoni che di tanto in tanto rimbombavano. Forse voleva finire in fretta di mangiare per poter fiondarsi alla finestra. Era da un po' che era impaziente, in attesa che il pasto si concludesse...
Turkish (TR): Maria ara sıra çakan gök gürültüsü için gerçekten heyecanlanmış gibi görünüyordu.{n}Belki de bir an önce yemeğini bitirip pencereye koşmak istiyordu.{n}Bir süredir kıpırdanıyor, yemeğin bitmesini bekliyordu.

Umineko Project (UP): ......Some people are afraid of thunder, while others find it interesting, and Maria was apparently one of the latter.
Steam (ST): ......Some people are afraid of thunder, while others find it interesting, and Maria was apparently one of the latter sort.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……雷って怖がるヤツと面白がるヤツの２つがいるが、どうやら真里亞は後者らしいなぁ。
Russian (RU): ......Одни люди боятся грома, тогда как другие находят его интересным, и Мария, по‐видимому, принадлежала к последним.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Algumas pessoas têm medo de trovões, enquanto outras acham interessantes, e a Maria parecia ser do segundo tipo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……世上既有怕打雷的人也有喜歡打雷的人，看來真里亞是屬於後者。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……世上既有怕打雷的人也有喜欢打雷的人，看来真里亚是属于后者。
Indonesian (IDN): ......Ada orang yang takut pada petir, tapi ada juga yang menganggapnya menarik, dan Maria tampaknya termasuk tipe yang terakhir.
Italian (IT): Ci sono persone che hanno paura dei tuoni e altre che li trovano interessanti, e Maria apparentemente faceva parte di quest'ultima categoria.
Turkish (TR): ......Bazı insanlar gök gürültüsünden korkarken, diğerleri onu ilginç bulur ve Maria da görünüşe göre ikincilerden biriydi.

Umineko Project (UP): So, when she heard from George‐aniki that dinner was over, a huge smile broke across her face.
Steam (ST): Therefore, when she heard from George-aniki that dinner was over, a huge smile broke across her face.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Therefore, when she heard from George-aniki that dinner was over, a huge smile broke across her face.
PC Japanese (JP): だから、譲治の兄貴に食事はこれでおしまいだと教えてもらえて、満面の笑みを浮かべた。
Russian (RU): Поэтому, когда она услышала от Джорджа‐аники, что обед закончился, её лицо расплылось в широкой улыбке.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então, quando ela ouviu do George‐aniki que o jantar havia acabado, um grande sorriso percorreu seu rosto.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，在讓治大哥告訴她用餐已經結束後，她露出了滿面的笑容。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，在让治大哥告诉她用餐已经结束后，她露出了满面的笑容。
Indonesian (IDN): Jadi ketika dia mendengar dari George-aniki bahwa makan malam sudah selesai, senyum lebar langsung merekah di wajahnya.
Italian (IT): Così, quando il fratellone George le disse che la cena era finita, sul suo volto comparve un sorriso enorme.
Turkish (TR): Bu yüzden George-aniki'den yemeğin bittiğini duyduğunda yüzünde kocaman bir gülümseme belirdi.

Umineko Project (UP): She then stood from her seat, took out her handbag—which she had set under her seat, never having left it even while she was eating—and began fishing around inside of it.
Steam (ST): She then rose from her seat, took out her handbag—which she'd set under her seat, never having left it even while she was eating—and began fishing around inside of it.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She then stood from her seat, took out her hand bag - which she had set under her seat, never having left it even while she was eating - and began fishing around inside of it.
PC Japanese (JP): そして席を立つと、椅子の下に置き、食事の時間にも側から離さなかった手提げを取り出しその中を漁る。
Russian (RU): Встав со своего места, она взяла свою сумку, поставленную ею под стул, с которой она не расставалась даже во время еды, и начала рыться в её содержимом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela então permaneceu em seu assento, tirando da sua bolsa — que ela havia colocado debaixo de sua cadeira, nunca deixando‐a mesmo enquanto estava comendo — e começou a procurar dentro dela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然後她從座位上站了起來，打開放在椅子下面的連吃飯的時候都不肯離身的手提包，找了起來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后她从座位上站了起来，打开放在椅子下面的连吃饭的时候都不肯离身的手提包，找了起来。
Indonesian (IDN): Dia lalu bangkit dari kursinya, mengambil tas tangan yang diletakkan di bawah kursinya—yang bahkan tak ia tinggalkan meski sedang makan—dan mulai mengacak-acak isinya.
Italian (IT): Successivamente, si alzò in piedi, tirò fuori la sua borsa, che aveva tenuto sotto la sedia e da cui non si era separata neanche durante la cena, e rovistò al suo interno.
Turkish (TR): Sonra oturduğu yerden kalktı, koltuğunun altına koyduğu—ve yemek yerken bile yanından ayırmadığı çantasını çıkardı—ve içinde bir şeyler aramaya başladı.

Umineko Project (UP): No one seemed particularly concerned with this behavior...
Steam (ST): No one seemed particularly concerned by this behavior...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): No one seemed particularly concerned with this behavior...

Russian (RU): Никто не нашёл в этом ничего странного...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ninguém parecia particularmente preocupado com isso...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 誰都沒有對她這動作，抱以特別的關心…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 谁都没有对她这动作，抱以特别的关心…。

Italian (IT): Nessuno sembrava particolarmente colpito dal suo comportamento...
Turkish (TR): Kimse bu davranışla özellikle ilgilenmiş görünmüyordu...

Umineko Project (UP): George was the first to notice it.{n}As he spoke, Battler also noticed.
Steam (ST): George was the first to notice it. As he spoke, Battler noticed too.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): George was the first to notice it. As he spoke, Battler also noticed.
PC Japanese (JP): 最初に気付いたのは譲治だった。その言葉で戦人も気付く。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 最初に気付いたのは譲治だった。{n}その言葉で戦人も気付く。
Russian (RU): Джордж первым заметил его.{n}А как только он заговорил, и Баттлер тоже.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): George foi o primeiro a perceber.{n}Quando ele falou, Battler também percebeu.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 第一個注意到的人是讓治。{n}聽到讓治這句話，戰人也注意到了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 第一个注意到的人是让治。{n}听到让治这句话，战人也注意到了。

Italian (IT): George fu il primo a notarla. A quelle parole, anche Battler se ne accorse.
Turkish (TR): Bunu ilk fark eden George oldu.{n}O konuştuğunda, Battler da fark etti.

Umineko Project (UP): When they looked, they noticed that Maria was now holding a beautiful Western‐style envelope.
Steam (ST): They saw that Maria was now holding a beautiful, Western-style envelope.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When they looked, they noticed that Maria was now holding a beautiful western-style envelope.
PC Japanese (JP): 見れば、いつの間にか真里亞の手には綺麗な洋形封筒が握られていた。
Russian (RU): Когда они присмотрелись, то увидели, что Мария держала красивый западный конверт.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando eles olharam, viram que Maria estava segurando um belo envelope de estilo ocidental.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 朝真里亞一看，不知從何時開始，她的手上多了一封漂亮的西式信封。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 朝真里亚一看，不知从何时开始，她的手上多了一封漂亮的西式信封。
Indonesian (IDN): Mereka melihat bahwa Maria kini memegang sebuah amplop bergaya Barat yang sangat indah.
Italian (IT): Videro che all'insaputa di tutti, Maria teneva tra le mani un'elegante busta da lettere in stile occidentale.
Turkish (TR): Baktıklarında Maria'nın elinde Batı tarzı güzel bir zarf olduğunu fark ettiler.

Umineko Project (UP): On the front of the envelope, the Ushiromiya family crest—the One‐winged Eagle—was done in gold leaf.
Steam (ST): On the front of the envelope, the Ushiromiya family crest—the One-Winged Eagle—was done in gold leaf.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): On the front of the envelope, the Ushiromiya family crest - the One-winged Eagle - was done in gold leaf.
PC Japanese (JP): その封筒の表面には、右代宮家の家紋である片翼の鷲をイメージしたものが箔押しされていた。
Russian (RU): На передней стороне конверта находился герб семьи Уширомия — Однокрылый орёл, выполненный золотой фольгой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Na frente do envelope, o símbolo da família Ushiromiya — a Águia de Uma Asa — feito em folha de ouro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 信封表面，鑲著像是右代宮家家徽——片翼之鷲的金邊。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 信封表面，镶着像是右代宫家家徽——片翼之鹫的金边。
Indonesian (IDN): Di bagian depan amplop itu, lambang keluarga Ushiromiya Elang Bersayap Satu tercetak dalam daun emas.
Italian (IT): Sulla superficie della busta era placcata in oro un'aquila monoalata, lo stemma della famiglia Ushiromiya.
Turkish (TR): Zarfın ön yüzünde Ushiromiya ailesinin arması olan—Tek Kanatlı Kartal—altın baskıyla işlenmişti.

Umineko Project (UP): Furthermore, it was sealed with dark red wax, imbuing a level of class upon it that made it clear that this was not something that Maria should be carrying around for fun.
Steam (ST): Furthermore, the fact that it was sealed with dark-red wax made it clear that this wasn't something Maria could have brought as a prank.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Furthermore, the fact that it was sealed with dark-red wax made it clear that this was not something that Maria could have brought as a prank.
PC Japanese (JP): さらに赤黒い蝋で封までされていて、真里亞がいたずらに持っていていいものではない、格を感じさせた。
Russian (RU): Более того, конверт был запечатан тёмно‐красным воском, отчего становилось ясно, что это был не розыгрыш со стороны Марии.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Além disso, estava selado com uma cera vermelho‐escuro, que dava um toque de classe sobre ele, deixando claro que não era algo que Maria estaria carregando apenas por diversão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 再加上封口被赤黑色的蠟封著，讓人感覺這不是真里亞可以拿來玩的高貴之物。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 再加上封口被赤黑色的蜡封着，让人感觉这不是真里亚可以拿来玩的高贵之物。
Indonesian (IDN): Selain itu, fakta bahwa amplop itu tersegel dengan lilin merah tua menunjukkan bahwa ini bukan sesuatu yang bisa dibawa Maria sebagai lelucon.
Italian (IT): Inoltre, il fatto che fosse addirittura stata sigillata con della ceralacca rossa scura, rendeva palese che non potesse essere uno scherzo di Maria.
Turkish (TR): Ayrıca, koyu kırmızı balmumuyla mühürlenmişti ve bu da Maria'nın eğlence olsun diye yanında taşıması gereken bir şey olmadığını açıkça ortaya koyan bir klas seviyesi aşılıyordu.

Steam (ST): "......Maria-chan, what is that?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......Maria-chan, what is that?"

Umineko Project (UP): It seemed that Natsuhi had also noticed the strangeness of the envelope that Maria was holding.{n}Because her voice sounded too serious to be admonishing a small child, the other relatives around her finally noticed.
Steam (ST): It seemed that Natsuhi had also noticed the strangeness of the envelope Maria was holding. Her voice sounded too serious for someone admonishing a small child, so the relatives around us finally noticed too.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It seemed that Natsuhi had also noticed the strangeness of the envelope that Maria was holding. Because her voice sounded too serious to be admonishing a small child, the other relatives around her finally noticed.
PC Japanese (JP): 夏妃も、真里亞が持つその封筒の異様さに気付いたらしい。小さな子に諭すにしては厳しすぎるその口調で、周りの親類たちもようやく気が付いた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 夏妃も、真里亞が持つその封筒の異様さに気付いたらしい。{n}小さな子に諭すにしては厳しすぎるその口調で、周りの親類たちもようやく気が付いた。
Russian (RU): Похоже, тётя Нацухи тоже обратила внимание на странность конверта в руках у Марии.{n}Поскольку её тон был слишком серьёзным по сравнению с тоном, каким увещевают маленьких детей, остальные родственники, наконец, тоже соизволили обратить внимание.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Parecia que Natsuhi também havia percebido o estranho envelope que Maria estava segurando.{n}Como sua voz tinha soado muito séria para alguém que estava questionando uma criança, os outros familiares finalmente passaram a prestar atenção nela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 夏妃似乎也察覺到了真里亞拿著的那封信封有些不同尋常。{n}伯母那以教訓小孩子來說未免太過嚴厲的語調，使周圍的親戚們終於也都把注意力轉了過來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 夏妃似乎也察觉到了真里亚拿着的那封信封有些不同寻常。{n}伯母那以教训小孩子来说未免太过严厉的语调，使周围的亲戚们终于也都把注意力转了过来。
Indonesian (IDN): Tampaknya Natsuhi juga menyadari keanehan amplop yang sedang dipegang Maria. Suaranya terdengar terlalu serius untuk sekadar menegur seorang anak kecil, jadi para kerabat di sekitar kami akhirnya ikut memperhatikan.
Italian (IT): Sembrava che anche Natsuhi si fosse accorta della stranezza della busta posseduta da Maria. Siccome la sua voce era troppo seria per un semplice richiamo ad una bambina, anche gli altri parenti intorno finalmente se ne accorsero.
Turkish (TR): Maria'nın elindeki zarfın tuhaflığını Natsuhi de fark etmiş görünüyordu.{n}Sesi küçük bir çocuğu uyarmak için fazla ciddi olduğundan, etrafındaki diğer akrabalar da sonunda fark etti.

Umineko Project (UP): As Nanjo muttered that, even us kids could understand why everyone seemed to be frozen solid.
Steam (ST): When Nanjo muttered that, even us kids could understand why everyone seemed to be frozen solid.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando Nanjo murmurou isso, mesmo nós crianças entendemos o motivo de todos parecerem estar perplexos.

Steam (ST): The envelope that Maria held was one of the Ushiromiya Family Head's custom-made envelopes for private use.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O envelope que a Maria estava segurando era um dos envelopes feitos sob medida para o chefe da família Ushiromiya para uso pessoal.

Turkish (TR): Maria'nın elindeki zarf Ushiromiya aile reisinin özel kullanım için yaptırdığı zarflardan biriydi.

Umineko Project (UP): "But, in this mansion, couldn't there be several identical seals? For example, if there was some kind of stamp for wax seals, couldn't someone other than Kinzo‐san have sealed it?"

Russian (RU): "А может в этом особняке быть несколько идентичных печатей? К примеру, если существует какой‐нибудь штемпель для восковых печатей, разве не мог кто‐нибудь, помимо Кинзо‐сана, поставить эту печать?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Mas, nessa mansão, não poderia haver diversos outros selos idênticos? Por exemplo, se tivesse um outro tipo de carimbo para selos de cera, outra pessoa além do Kinzo‐san não poderia ter selado a carta?"

Indonesian (IDN): "Tapi bukankah ada beberapa benda di mansion ini yang punya lambang itu? Misalnya, kalau ada stempel segel lilin, bukankah orang lain selain Kinzo-san bisa saja menggunakannya?"
Italian (IT): "Ma non potrebbero esserci diversi sigilli identici in questa villa? Per esempio, se ci fosse qualche timbro per ceralacca, non potrebbe averlo usato una persona diversa da Kinzo-san?"
Turkish (TR): "Ama bu malikanede aynı mühürden birkaç tane olamaz mı? Örneğin, balmumu mühürler için bir çeşit damga varsa, Kinzo-san'dan başka biri mühürlemiş olamaz mı?"

Italian (IT): "No, per i suoi sigilli in ceralacca Kinzo-san usa sempre un'incisione nel suo anello, ‘il simbolo del capofamiglia degli Ushiromiya’... La forma e la complessità dei suoi motivi provengono sicuramente dall'anello di Kinzo-san..."
Turkish (TR): "Hayır, Kinzo-san balmumunu mühürlerken her zaman parmağındaki "Ushiromiya Aile Reisliği Kanıtı" olan yüzüğünü kullanırdı. Bu şekil ve karmaşık tasarım kesinlikle Kinzo-san'ın mührü..."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Umineko Project (UP): "That is not necessarily so. Anyone in the family must have received a letter from Dad at least once. We can't eliminate the possibility that someone, using that wax as a model, created a fake seal to pass themselves off as Father."
Steam (ST): "That is not necessarily so. Anyone in the family must have received a letter from Father at least once. We can't eliminate the possibility that someone used that wax as a model to create a fake seal and pass themselves off as Father."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "That is not necessarily so. Anyone in the family must have received a letter from Father at least once. We can't eliminate the possibility that someone, using that wax as a model, created a fake seal to pass themselves off as Father."
PC Japanese (JP): 「そうとは限らんよ。親族であれば一度くらいは親父の手紙を受け取ったことはあるはずだ。その封蝋を元に、偽の紋章を作り親父殿を騙って刻印した可能性が否めない。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そうとは限らんよ。親族であれば一度くらいは親父の手紙を受け取ったことはあるはずだ。その封蝋を元に、偽の紋章を作り親父殿を騙って刻印した可能性が否めない」
Russian (RU): "Это не обязательно. Кто‐нибудь в семье хотя бы раз получал письмо от отца. Мы не можем отбросить возможность, что кто‐то, воспользовавшись моделью этой печати, создал фальшивую печать, чтобы притвориться отцом."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Isso não é necessariamente verdade. Qualquer um da família já deve ter recebido ao menos uma carta do pai. Nós não podemos eliminar a possibilidade de que alguém, usando esse selo como modelo, criou um selo falso para se passar pelo pai."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「這可不一定。只要是親戚中的一員，就理應至少收到過一次從爸那寄來的信。沒准是有人以過去的封蠟為原型，做了個假紋章蓋上來欺騙我們說此為父親所蓋。這種可能性不能排除。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「这可不一定。只要是亲戚中的一员，就理应至少收到过一次从爸那寄来的信。没准是有人以过去的封蜡为原型，做了个假纹章盖上来欺骗我们说此为父亲所盖。这种可能性不能排除。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Tidak bisa dibilang begitu juga. Setiap orang di keluarga pasti pernah menerima surat dari Ayah setidaknya sekali. Kita tak bisa menyingkirkan kemungkinan bahwa seseorang meniru segel itu dan berpura-pura sebagai Ayah."
Italian (IT): "Non necessariamente. Tutti in famiglia avranno ricevuto almeno una volta una lettera da papà. Non possiamo escludere la possibilità che qualcuno, usando quella ceralacca come modello, abbia creato un'imitazione dell'emblema, e che l'abbia inciso per passare come nostro padre."
Turkish (TR): "Öyle olması şart değil. Ailedeki herkes babamdan en az bir kez mektup almış olmalı. Birinin bu balmumunu model olarak kullanarak, kendisini babam olarak tanıtmak için sahte bir mühür yaratmış olma ihtimalini ortadan kaldıramayız."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Umineko Project (UP): "I agree with Aniki. No matter how the seal resembles Dad's, we can't prove that it is the real thing. Therefore, it doesn't prove that this envelope came from Dad."
Steam (ST): "I agree with Aniki. No matter how much the seal resembles Dad's, we can't prove that it's the real thing. So it doesn't prove this envelope came from him."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "I agree with Aniki. No matter how the seal resembles Father's, we can't prove that it is the real thing. Therefore, it doesn't prove that this envelope came from Father."
PC Japanese (JP): 「兄貴に同感だ。封蝋に刻印されている紋章が、どれだけ親父の物に酷似していたとしても、間違いなく親父の物であるとは証明不能だぜ。だからその封筒が親父の物であるという証拠にはならない。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「兄貴に同感だ。封蝋に刻印されている紋章が、どれだけ親父の物に酷似していたとしても、間違いなく親父の物であるとは証明不能だぜ。だからその封筒が親父の物であるという証拠にはならない」
Russian (RU): "Я согласен с братом. Не важно, насколько данная печать напоминает печать отца, мы не можем доказать её подлинность. Таким образом у нас нет доказательств, что письмо пришло от отца."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu concordo com o aniki. Não importa o quanto o selo pareça com o do pai, não podemos provar que ele é verdadeiro. Além disso, isso não prova que esse envelope veio do pai."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我贊同大哥的意見。無論蓋在封蠟上的紋章有多麼酷似於爸蓋的，都沒法證明它一定是爸的東西。所以這不能成為，這信封是爸的東西的證據。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我赞同大哥的意见。无论盖在封蜡上的纹章有多么酷似于爸盖的，都没法证明它一定是爸的东西。所以这不能成为，这信封是爸的东西的证据。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Aku setuju dengan Aniki. Meski segelnya mirip segel milik Ayah, kita tak bisa membuktikan bahwa itu segel asli. Jadi ini belum membuktikan bahwa amplop ini benar-benar darinya."
Italian (IT): "Sono d'accordo, fratellone. Non importa quanto l'emblema inciso nel sigillo in ceralacca assomigli a quello di papà, non si può provare con certezza che sia suo. Perciò, questo non prova che la busta sia di papà."
Turkish (TR): "Aniki'ye katılıyorum. Mühür babamınkine ne kadar benzerse benzesin, gerçek olduğunu kanıtlayamayız. Bu nedenle, bu zarfın babamdan geldiğini kanıtlamaz."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Umineko Project (UP): "I feel the same way. I cannot approve of arbitrarily deciding that this is Father's letter only by the seal in the wax. Doctor Nanjo, would you mind refraining from speaking such vague words...?!"
Steam (ST): "I absolutely agree. I cannot approve of arbitrarily deciding that this letter came from Father...based solely on the wax seal. Doctor Nanjo, couldn't you use a bit more discretion with your vague words...?!"

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu penso da mesma forma. Eu não posso aprovar tamanha decisão arbitrária de que essa carta é do pai só porque tem o selo de cera. Doutor Nanjo, você se importaria de não falar com palavras tão vagas...?!"

Indonesian (IDN): "Aku sepenuhnya setuju. Aku tidak bisa menerima keputusan sepihak bahwa surat ini berasal dari Ayah... hanya berdasarkan segel lilin. Dokter Nanjo, tidakkah kau bisa sedikit lebih bijaksana dalam ucapanmu yang samar itu...?!"
Italian (IT): "La penso anch'io allo stesso modo. Non posso accettare che si decida arbitrariamente che questa lettera sia di nostro padre solo in base al sigillo in ceralacca. Dottor Nanjo, potrebbe astenersi dal parlare in modo vago...?!"
Turkish (TR): "Ben de aynı şekilde düşünüyorum. Sadece balmumundaki mühre bakarak bunun babamın mektubu olduğuna keyfi olarak karar vermeyi onaylayamam. Doktor Nanjo, böyle belirsiz kelimeler kullanmaktan kaçınır mısın...?!"
