Oppure era una rampolla eccentrica che lo ha sovvenzionato, tramite un accordo simile ad uno di quei patti col diavolo."
Turkish (TR): "Her şeyi baştan alalım. Kısacası, babamın Aniki'nin bile bilmediği güvenilir bir sırdaşı var. Dahası, bu kişi her zaman altınları izlemek ve yönetmekten sorumlu olmuştur. Bu kişinin, ilk etapta sahte bir şeytan sözleşmesi yoluyla finansmanını sağlayan çok zengin bir ailenin amatör bir üyesi olması mümkündür."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Umineko Project (UP): ".........Could it be that this confidante, this {f:5:Beatrice}‐san, is trying to test which of the sons and daughters is most fitting to be financed by her gold?"
Steam (ST): "......Could it be that this confidante called {f:5:Beatrice}...is trying to test which of Kinzo's children is most worthy to be financed by her gold?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ".........Could it be that this confidante called Beatrice is trying to test which of the sons and daughters is most fitting to be financed by her gold?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「………その腹心のベアトリーチェさんは、自分の黄金を融資する相手として、息子兄弟の誰が相応しいか試したい、ということなのかしら？」
Russian (RU): ".........Может ли быть так, что это доверенное лицо по имени {f:5:Беатриче} пытается проверить, кто из сыновей и дочерей наиболее достоит стать владельцем золота?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Poderia ser que esse confidente, essa {f:5:Beatrice}‐san, esteja tentando testar qual dos filhos e filhas é o mais preparado para ser financiado pelo ouro?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………那是不是指這位心腹貝阿朵莉切，想試試兄妹中的幾個誰最適合成為自己的黃金的融資對象呢？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………那是不是指这位心腹贝阿朵莉切，想试试兄妹中的几个谁最适合成为自己的黄金的融资对象呢？」
Indonesian (IDN): "......Apa mungkin orang kepercayaan bernama {f:5:Beatrice} ini... sedang menguji siapa di antara anak-anak Kinzo yang paling layak mendapatkan dukungan emas darinya?"
Italian (IT): "...Magari questa confidente, dal nome di {f:5:Beatrice}, vuole accertarsi su chi tra i figli sia il più adatto ad essere finanziato dal suo oro?"
Turkish (TR): ".........Bu sırdaş, yani {f:5:Beatrice}-san, hangi oğlunun ya da kızının kendi altınlarıyla finanse edilmeye en uygun olduğunu test etmeye çalışıyor olabilir mi?"

Umineko Project (UP): What Kyrie said was something that all of the siblings wanted clarified.
Steam (ST): Kyrie's question was one that all the siblings wanted answered.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): What Kyrie said was something that all of the siblings wanted to be made clear.
PC Japanese (JP): その霧江の一言は、兄弟たちの誰もがはっきりさせたい一言だった。
Russian (RU): Сказанные Кирие слова братья и сёстры как раз и хотели прояснить.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O que Kyrie disse era tudo o que os filhos queriam esclarecer.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 霧江的這句話，正是無論兄妹中的誰都想要的痛快明了的一句話。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 雾江的这句话，正是无论兄妹中的谁都想要的痛快明了的一句话。
Indonesian (IDN): Pertanyaan Kyrie itu adalah hal yang ingin diketahui semua saudara.
Italian (IT): Quelle ultime parole di Kirie, erano qualcosa che tutti i fratelli volevano mettere bene in chiaro.
Turkish (TR): Kyrie'nin söyledikleri tüm kardeşlerin açıklığa kavuşturulmasını istediği bir konuydu.

Umineko Project (UP): Upon reflection, they realized that during the time Kinzo's strange epitaph had been displayed in the hall beneath the portrait of the witch, they had always whispered that the one who solved the puzzle would receive everything, ......yet no one had ever clearly stated it.
Steam (ST): Upon reflection, they realized that Kinzo's strange epitaph had hung in the hall beneath the witch's portrait for quite some time, and while it had long been whispered that whoever solved the puzzle would receive everything, ......no one had ever clearly stated it.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Upon reflection, they realized that Kinzo's strange epitaph had always hung in the hall beneath the portrait of the witch, and while it had long been whispered that the one who solved the puzzle would receive everything, ......no one had ever clearly stated it.
PC Japanese (JP): 思えば今日まで、ホールの魔女の肖像画の下に、あれほどの怪しげな碑文が掲載され、それを暴いた者に全てが与えられるのではと囁かれながらも、……誰も、そうだとはっきり言明しなかった。
Russian (RU): Обдумав это, им стало ясно, почему загадочная эпитафия Кинзо всегда находилась в коридоре под портретом ведьмы, и хотя среди них уже давно ходили слухи, что тот, кто сможет разрешить головоломку, получит всё... Никто никогда прямо не заявлял об этом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Após a reflexão, eles perceberam que durante o tempo que o estranho epitáfio de Kinzo esteve à mostra sob o retrato da bruxa, eles sempre haviam sussurrado que aquele que o resolvesse receberia tudo, ......ainda que nenhum deles tenha deixado isso claro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 想來時至今日，門廳裡魔女的肖像畫下方，就一直揭載著怪異的碑文之謎，雖總有耳聞解開它就會得到一切，……但誰都沒有將這事斬釘截鐵地挑明過。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 想来时至今日，门厅里魔女的肖像画下方，就一直揭载着怪异的碑文之谜，虽总有耳闻解开它就会得到一切，……但谁都没有将这事斩钉截铁地挑明过。
Indonesian (IDN): Setelah dipikir-pikir, mereka sadar bahwa epitaf aneh Kinzo sudah lama tergantung di aula di bawah potret sang penyihir, dan meskipun selama ini terdengar desas-desus bahwa siapa pun yang memecahkan teka-tekinya akan mendapatkan segalanya, ......tak seorang pun pernah menyatakannya secara jelas.
Italian (IT): Riflettendoci su, quell'epigrafe tanto strana era sempre stata in mostra nel salone, sotto il ritratto della strega, e se da un lato si vociferava che sarebbe stata ceduta ogni cosa a chi l'avrebbe risolta... nessuno l'aveva mai stabilito con chiarezza.
Turkish (TR): Düşündüklerinde, Kinzo'nun tuhaf kitabesinin salonda cadı portresinin altında sergilendiği süre boyunca, bilmeceyi çözenin her şeyi alacağını sürekli fısıldadıklarını fark ettiler, ......ancak hiç kimse bunu açıkça ifade etmemişti.

Umineko Project (UP): It was just something that everyone had hoped might be true.{n}That had, right here, right now, been clearly expressed by {f:5:Beatrice}'s letter!
Steam (ST): It was just something that everyone had hoped might be true. And right here, right now, the thing they'd hoped for had been clearly stated in {f:5:Beatrice}'s letter!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was just something that everyone had hoped might be true. That had, right here, right now, been clearly expressed by Beatrice's letter!
PC Japanese (JP): きっとそうに違いないと夢を見てきただけなのだ。それが、今この場で、ベアトリーチェの手紙によって、はっきりと示される！
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): きっとそうに違いないと夢を見てきただけなのだ。{n}それが、今この場で、ベアトリーチェの手紙によって、はっきりと示される！
Russian (RU): Все лишь втайне надеялись, что это может оказаться правдой.{n}И теперь это прямо здесь, прямо сейчас, оказалось чётко сказано в письме {f:5:Беатриче}!
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era apenas algo que todos esperavam que pudesse ser verdade.{n}Isso havia sido, bem aqui e agora, expressado claramente pela carta de {f:5:Beatrice}!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 想必他們一直以來都只是在做著夢，幻想著肯定是這麼回事而已。{n}而現在，在此處，貝阿朵莉切的信，給這件事痛快地下了個定論！
Chinese Simplified (CN): 想必他们一直以来都只是在做着梦，幻想着肯定是这么回事而已。{n}而现在，在此处，贝阿朵莉切的信，给这件事痛快地下了个定论！
Indonesian (IDN): Itu hanya harapan yang selama ini mereka simpan. Dan sekarang, di sini, di saat ini juga, hal yang mereka harapkan itu telah dinyatakan dengan jelas dalam surat dari {f:5:Beatrice}!
Italian (IT): Era solo qualcosa che si sperava fosse vero. E ciò era stato espresso chiaramente, proprio lì, in quel momento, grazie alla lettera di {f:5:Beatrice}!
Turkish (TR): Bu sadece herkesin doğru olabileceğini umduğu bir şeydi.{n}{f:5:Beatrice}'in mektubu işte tam burada, şu anda bunu açıkça ifade ediyordu!

Umineko Project (UP): It clearly specified that everything of the Ushiromiya family would be given to the one who found the gold.
Steam (ST): It clearly specified that everything of the Ushiromiya family would be given to the one who found the gold.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 隠し黄金を見つけ出した者に、右代宮家の全てが与えられると、はっきり明示したのだ。
Russian (RU): В нём ясно говорилось, что всё в семье Уширомия будет принадлежать тому, кто найдёт золото.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Estava claramente especificado que tudo referente à família Ushiromiya deveria ser dado para aquele que encontrasse o ouro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 信裡清清楚楚地明示了，找到藏金之人就能獲得右代宮家的一切。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 信里清清楚楚地明示了，找到藏金之人就能获得右代宫家的一切。
Indonesian (IDN): Disebutkan secara eksplisit bahwa semua milik keluarga Ushiromiya akan diberikan pada siapa pun yang menemukan emasnya.
Italian (IT): Specificava nettamente che, tutto quel che apparteneva alla famiglia Ushiromiya, sarebbe stato ceduto a chi avrebbe scoperto l'oro.
Turkish (TR): Ushiromiya ailesine ait her şeyin altını bulana verileceği açıkça belirtiliyordu.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Umineko Project (UP): "Kinzo‐sama has already publicly displayed the location of the hidden gold within the epitaph under my portrait. The rules apply equally to all who can read the epitaph. If you discover the gold, I shall return everything to you."
Steam (ST): "Kinzo-sama has already publicly displayed the location of the hidden gold within the epitaph under my portrait. The rules apply equally to all who can read the epitaph. If you discover the gold, I shall return everything to you.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Kinzo-sama has already publicly displayed the location of the hidden gold within the epitaph under my portrait. The rules apply equally to all who can read the epitaph. If you discover the gold, I shall return everything to you.
PC Japanese (JP): 「黄金の隠し場所については、すでに金蔵さまが私の肖像画の下に碑文にて公示されております。条件は碑文を読むことができる者すべてに公平に。黄金を暴けたなら、私は全てをお返しするでしょう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「黄金の隠し場所については、すでに金蔵さまが私の肖像画の下に碑文にて公示されております。条件は碑文を読むことができる者すべてに公平に。黄金を暴けたなら、私は全てをお返しするでしょう」
Russian (RU): "Что же касается места, где спрятано золото Кинзо‐сама, оно описано в эпитафии под портретом. Каждый, кто сможет разгадать эпитафию, встанет вровень со мной. Если вы сможете найти золото, я непременно верну вам всё."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "O Kinzo‐sama já exibiu publicamente a localização do ouro através do epitáfio sob o meu retrato. As regras se aplicam igualmente a todos que puderem ler. Se você descobrir a localização do ouro, eu devo devolver tudo para você."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「關於黃金所藏之處，金藏老爺早已公示在我的肖像畫下方的碑文之中。條件對於所有能夠讀到碑文的人來說都是公平的。只要找到黃金，我自然會將一切返還。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「关于黄金所藏之处，金藏老爷早已公示在我的肖像画下方的碑文之中。条件对于所有能够读到碑文的人来说都是公平的。只要找到黄金，我自然会将一切返还。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Kinzo-sama telah secara terbuka menampilkan lokasi emas tersembunyi itu dalam epitaf di bawah potretnya. Aturannya berlaku sama bagi siapa pun yang dapat membaca epitaf itu. Jika kau menemukan emasnya, aku akan mengembalikan segalanya padamu.
Italian (IT): "Per quanto riguarda il nascondiglio dell'oro, il signor Kinzo l'ha già esposto pubblicamente, all'interno dell'epigrafe al di sotto del mio ritratto. I termini verranno applicati equamente, a tutti coloro in grado di leggere l'epigrafe.{n}Se riuscirete a trovare l'oro, vi restituirò ogni cosa."
Turkish (TR): "Saklı altının konumu çoktan Kinzo-sama tarafından açıkça portremin altındaki kitabede belirtilmişti. Kurallar kitabeyi okuyabilen herkes için eşit şekilde geçerlidir. Altını keşfedecek olursanız, her şeyi size iade edeceğim."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Umineko Project (UP): "Tonight, I ask that you enjoy your battle of wits with Kinzo‐sama to the fullest. I sincerely pray that this night will be both intellectual and elegant. {nobreak:—{f:5:Beatrice} the Golden}."
Steam (ST): Tonight, I ask that you enjoy your battle of wits with Kinzo-sama to the fullest. I sincerely pray that this night will be both intellectual and elegant. —{f:5:Beatrice} the Golden."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Tonight, I ask that you enjoy your battle of wits with Kinzo-sama to the fullest. I sincerely pray that this night will be both intellectual and elegant. ――Beatrice the Golden."
PC Japanese (JP): それではどうか今宵を、金蔵さまとの知恵比べにて存分にお楽しみくださいませ。今宵が知的かつ優雅な夜になるよう、心よりお祈りいたしております。——黄金のベアトリーチェ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「それではどうか今宵を、金蔵さまとの知恵比べにて存分にお楽しみくださいませ。今宵が知的かつ優雅な夜になるよう、心よりお祈りいたしております。――黄金のベアトリーチェ」
Russian (RU): "Наслаждайтесь битвой умов с Кинзо‐сама в полном объёме. Я искренне желаю, чтобы эта ночь оказалась сколь интеллектуальной, столь и изысканной.— Золотая Ведьма {f:5:Беатриче}."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Esta noite, eu peço que vocês aproveitem a sua batalha de inteligência contra o Kinzo‐sama ao máximo. Eu oro para que esta noite se torne uma ocasião intelectual e refinada. {nobreak:—{f:5:Beatrice}, d'Ouro}."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「那麼今宵，就請各位盡情享受和金藏老爺的智慧比試。我由衷期待，這會是知性與優雅的一夜。——黃金之貝阿朵莉切。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「那么今宵，就请各位尽情享受和金藏老爷的智慧比试。我由衷期待，这会是知性与优雅的一夜。——黄金之贝阿朵莉切。」
Indonesian (IDN): Malam ini, aku meminta kalian menikmati pertarungan akal kalian dengan Kinzo-sama sepenuhnya. Aku sungguh-sungguh berdoa agar malam ini menjadi malam yang penuh kecerdasan dan keanggunan. —{f:5:Beatrice} si Emas."
Italian (IT): "Perciò, godetevi appieno la gara d'ingegno di stasera con il signor Kinzo.{n}Spero dal profondo del cuore che la vostra sarà una serata intellettuale e di classe.{nobreak:—{f:5:Beatrice} la Dorata}."
Turkish (TR): "Bu gece, Kinzo-sama ile olan zeka savaşınızın tadını sonuna kadar çıkarmanızı rica ediyorum. Bu gecenin hem zarif hem de aydınlık bir gece olması için içtenlikle dua ediyorum. {nobreak:—Altın {f:5:Beatrice}}."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Umineko Project (UP): "......Father, I know you can hear me! Please respond!"
Steam (ST): "......Father, I know you can hear me! Please respond!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「……お父さん、聞こえているはずです！　返事をしてください！」
Russian (RU): "......Отец, я знаю, что ты меня слышишь! Пожалуйста, ответь!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Pai, eu sei que você pode me ouvir! Responda, por favor!"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……爸，您应该听得到的！请回答我一下！」

Umineko Project (UP): The door to Kinzo's study was being violently, violently beaten against over and over again like a percussion instrument.
Steam (ST): The door to Kinzo's study was being violently, harshly beaten against over and over again like a percussion instrument.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 金蔵の書斎の扉が、打楽器のように激しく激しく何度も叩かれている。
Russian (RU): В дверь кабинета стучали так яростно и безостановочно, словно та была ударным инструментом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A porta do estúdio de Kinzo estava sendo violentada com agressivas batidas contra ela de novo e de novo, como um instrumento de percussão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 金藏書房的門，如打擊樂器一般，一次又一次被激烈敲打著。

Turkish (TR): Kinzo'nun çalışma odasının kapısı bir vurmalı çalgı gibi şiddetle, tekrar tekrar yumruklanıyordu.

Umineko Project (UP): The screams coming from the other side were Krauss's, Rudolf's, and sometimes Eva's voices.
Steam (ST): The yells coming from the other side belonged to Krauss, Rudolf, and sometimes Eva.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The screams coming from the other side were Krauss's, Rudolf's, and sometimes Eva's voices.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os gritos que vinham do outro lado eram de Krauss, Rudolf e, em alguns momentos, de Eva.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 从门的另一边听到的叫喊声，是藏臼、留弗夫，和偶尔夹杂在一起的绘羽的声音。

Umineko Project (UP): It was the siblings, who were trying to intrude upon Kinzo's study to question him about the truth behind that mysterious letter.

Umineko Project (UP): An elegant tablecloth was set over the desk, and the fabulous dinner that had colored the table down in the dining hall was once again laid out.
Steam (ST): An elegant tablecloth was set over the desk, and the fabulous dinner that had adorned the table down in the dining hall was reproduced here.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Com uma elegante toalha de mesa, e um fabuloso jantar que já havia colorido a mesa da sala de jantar anteriormente.

Umineko Project (UP): Kinzo continued his meal in silence.{n}...Shannon, taking away an empty plate, looked uncomfortably between the door being beaten on and Kinzo's face.
Steam (ST): Kinzo continued his meal in silence. ...Shannon, taking away an empty plate, looked uncomfortably between the door being pounded on and Kinzo's face.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Kinzo continued his meal in silence....Shannon, taking away an empty plate, looked uncomfortably between the door being beaten on and Kinzo's face.
PC Japanese (JP): 黙々と食事を進める金蔵。…空いた皿を下げる紗音は、叩かれ続ける扉と金蔵の顔を、不安げに見比べる。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 黙々と食事を進める金蔵。{n}…空いた皿を下げる紗音は、叩かれ続ける扉と金蔵の顔を、不安げに見比べる。
Russian (RU): Кинзо молча продолжал есть.{n}...Шаннон, убирая пустую посуду, с беспокойством переводила взгляд то на дверь, в которую продолжали стучать, то на лицо Кинзо.

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 金藏一言不發地吃著晚餐。{n}…撤下空盤的紗音，不安地看了看響個不停的門，又望向金藏的臉。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 金藏一言不发地吃着晚餐。{n}…撤下空盘的纱音，不安地看了看响个不停的门，又望向金藏的脸。
Indonesian (IDN): Kinzo melanjutkan makannya dalam diam. ...Shannon, yang sedang mengambil piring kosong, tampak gelisah memandangi pintu yang terus digedor dan wajah Kinzo.
Italian (IT): Kinzo continuò in silenzio il suo pasto... Shannon, che stava portando via dei piatti vuoti, alternò il suo sguardo disagiato tra la porta che stava venendo percossa, e il volto di Kinzo.
Turkish (TR): Kinzo yemeğine sessizlik içinde devam etti.{n}...Shannon, boş bir tabağı alıp rahatsız bir şekilde kapıya vurulmakta olan kapı ile Kinzo'nun yüzü arasına baktı.

Speaker: Shannon
Umineko Project (UP): "...............Everyone is calling for you, but......what would you like me to do...?"
Steam (ST): "............Everyone is calling for you, ...but what should I do...?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "............Everyone is calling for you, but......but what should I do...?"

Russian (RU): "............Все зовут вас, но... Но что мне следует делать?.."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……………大家在喊老爷，…请问该怎么办…？」

Turkish (TR): "...............Herkes sizi çağırıyor, ama......ne yapmamı istersiniz...?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Umineko Project (UP): "...Leave it. God values silence, and so do I during dinner."

Original Witch Hunt (OG): "...Leave it. God and I value silence during dinner."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…不用管。神和我的晚餐，都同样珍视沉默。」
Indonesian (IDN): "...Biarkan saja. Tuhan dan makananku sama-sama menjunjung tinggi keheningan sebagai sebuah kebajikan."
Italian (IT): "...Lascia stare. Dio ed i miei pasti vanno contemplati in silenzio."

Umineko Project (UP): Genji quietly lowered his head and took a single step back.{n}...As he did, Kanon, who stood in reserve like a shadow behind and to the side of Genji, opened his mouth.
Steam (ST): Genji quietly lowered his head and took a single step back. ...As he did, Kanon, who stood in reserve like a shadow behind and to the side of Genji, opened his mouth.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Genji quietly lowered his head and took a single step back....As he did, Kanon, who stood in reserve like a shadow behind and to the side of Genji, opened his mouth.
PC Japanese (JP): 源次は静かに頭を下げると一歩下がる。…すると、源次の斜め後に影のように控えていた嘉音が口を開く。

Indonesian (IDN): Genji menundukkan kepala pelan dan mundur selangkah. ...Saat itu, Kanon, yang berdiri diam di belakang dan samping Genji seperti bayangan, membuka mulutnya.
